Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u gɛɛŋ be bo Kapanuŋ, bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kundi kiŋwaati ki li yih yi muntofi-i bɛ be ŋɛŋ Pita be sɔɔsɛ laa, “Wi wu ntiifɛ wunɛ wuni ti suuti nɛɛ kiŋwaati ki li yih yi muntofi-i ni?”
Beŋ le, “Iiŋ.” Le Pita to fɛkuuŋ, Jiso se shiiki fiee filu fɛkwiiŋ, bii li wuu laa, “Simu, ɔ ŋɛŋ fio le la? Bɛmfɔŋ bɛ laaŋkwiiŋ bani shiiŋ be fii kiŋwaati mɔɔ kichorɛ nuuŋ li ba-aŋ? Be ti shiiŋ be fii nuuŋ li bɔɔŋ bɛ bee mɔɔ li mfoŋ le?”
Pita tuu le, “Bɛ ti shiiŋ bɛ fii nuuŋ li mfoŋ.” Jiso se tee li wuu le, “Ɛ nuuŋ lɛ kɛ bɔɔŋ bɛɛŋku-u kɛmi yɛ le be ni be suuti kɛ.
Se nuuŋ le, kii tɛ ni tiŋgi-i shéŋ yi bɛniiŋ bɛlu siŋ, gɛnɛ ɔ lɔŋ ŋgwe lɛ libɛ-ɛ, nsuuŋ yi ɔ saa ɔ kɔɔ, ɔ gwiyɛ kimfimɛ ki yi-i, ɔ gii ɔ ŋɛŋ siri wu kwa le, ɔ buu wu ɔ gɛɛŋ ɔ nyɛ li bee le ɔ sooɔ kiŋwaati ki tɛɛbeŋ lu.”
Le ni nuuŋ li mfi wulu-u, bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso-o bɛ kintutu bɛ be bii li wuu laa, “Ɛ ŋwaani wi wu la wu ko ŋge lɛ bumfɔŋ bu liboo li?”
Jiso teeŋ ŋwaŋ wu bwi leeki lɛ bee lɛnti,
tee le, “Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, ɛ nɛ mɛɛŋ ki fiiki kɛ le nɛ to si bɔɔŋ bɛ bwi kɛ, nɛ tɛ naa le nɛ lɛ lɛ bumfɔŋ bu liboo li kɛ.
Wi wu shiiki yi yee si ŋwaŋ wuni, ɛ wu wu gii naa nuuŋ wi wu ko lɛ bumfɔŋ bu liboo li.
Ɛ wi fi ŋwaŋ si wuni kii mi, kɛ mwɛ fiiɔ tɛ nuuŋ mi.”
“Se nuuŋ le ɛ wi fɛ ŋwaŋ mumkpaŋ li kintutu ki bɔɔŋ bɛ bwi bɛ gɛɛ shéŋ li mi-i bani we li bibifi-i, kɛ fi dzɔɔŋ fiɛɛ le wɛɛ wi, bɛ shiiŋɛ jeni chi nɔŋa wu lɛwe, bɛ lɔŋ wu shee seri fɛ kindundu fɛkwiiŋ.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ li bɛniiŋ bɛ li nshɛ yini-i, kifɛ biee bi teeki le bɛniiŋ ni be feti biee bibifi biɛɛ lu. Biee bini kɛmi le bi ni bi nuuŋ lu, se nuuŋ le ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ li wi wu bɛɛ bɛ biee bilu.
Bɛdɛɛni ɛ kibɛnɛ ko mɔɔ nuuŋ kikaa ko feti le ɔ ni ɔ feti biee bibifi, ɔ sondɛ kibɛnɛ kilu kɛ kikaa kilu ɔ too. Fi dzɔɔŋ le ɔ lɛ li ntsɛ wu kimakɛ bɛ kibɛnɛ kɛ kikaa kiŋkɔsi, yɛki le ɔ kɛmɛ bibɛnu bichu bɛ bikaa bichu bɛ dzɔɔ wɛ bɛ lɔŋ fɛ wi wu kimakɛ-ɛ.
Ɛ lisi cho feti le ɔ ni ɔ feti biee bibifi, ɔ buu lisi chilu ɔ too. Fi dzɔɔŋ le ɔ lɛ lɛ ntsɛ wu kimakɛ-ɛ bɛ lisi chimumkpaŋ, yɛki le ɔ kɛmɛ lii chichi, bɛ lɔŋ wɛ fɛ wi wu kimakɛ-ɛ.”
“Ŋɛŋ yɛɛŋ le kiiŋ nɛ ni nɛ dzeti wumu li bɔɔŋ bɛ bɛntɛŋ bɛntɛŋ bani fɛkwiiŋ kɛ. Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le bɛnchindaa bɛ bee shiiŋ baa lɛ Baa wɛŋ lii mfi kwi liboo, be ŋiŋgi bushi bu Baa wɛŋ mfi kwi be bichi lɛ bɔɔŋ bani-i
[Ŋwanɛwi tɛ̀ bɛ nuuŋ le soo bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ saa be la.]
Nɛ beechi le la? Ɛ wi kɛmi nshɔ́ɔŋ gwii, yimumkpaŋ la li yi-i linti, gii le ki saa kɛ le chinɛ yi gwii mfomɛyoofi ntsɔ mfomɛyoofi yɛɛ li ŋkumɛ-ɛ, le gɛɛŋ gɔɔŋ nshɔɔŋ yimumkpaŋ yi la yilu ni?
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, ɛ wu gɔɔŋ wu ŋɛŋ, woo bujɔŋ bɛ nshɔɔŋ yimumkpaŋ yilu yɛki yi gwii mfomɛyoofi ntsɔ mfomɛyoofi yi mɛɛŋ ki laa kɛ yɛɛ.
Ɛ nɛɛ lɛ si Baa wunɛ wu nuuŋ liboo kɔŋgisi yɛ le wi mumkpaŋ li bɔɔŋ bɛ bwi bani-i le la kɛ.
Ɛ ŋwaana fɛ fiee fi bifi li wɛ-ɛ, ɔ gɛɛŋ ɔ ŋɛŋ wu ɔ doonchɛ bubiɛɛ bwee li wuu nɛɛ wu beŋ bɛfɛ. Ɛ wu woo fiee fiɔ tee, kɛ ɔ kaarɔɔ ɔ tuu ŋwaana li wɛ-ɛ bwiŋ.
Ɛ mɛɛŋ ki woo kɛ fiee fiɔ tee kɛ, ɔ dzɔ wi mumkpaŋ kɛ bɛfɛ nɛɛ be kaari nɛ gɛɛŋ fɛ wuu, le n'yɔru kwikwi kɛmɛ bɛniiŋ bɛfɛ kɛ bɛtɛɛtu bɛ lemi lɛ nsa wulu-u lɛjiŋ.
Ɛ nɛ gɛɛŋ wu faaŋ le wuki yɛ fiee fi nɛ tiiti kɛ, ɔ se dzɔ dɛɛni ɔ gɛɛŋ bɛ fi li kintaashɛ ki bɛniiŋ bɛ kimbeenchɛ-ɛ. Ɛ wu tuu wu faaŋ le wuki yɛ li kintaashɛ ki bɛniiŋ bɛ kimbeenchɛ-ɛ kɛ, ɔ dzɔ wu si wi wu ti kii yɛ Nyɔ kɛ, kɛ si wi wu kundi kiŋwaati.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le fiee fi nɛ gii nɛ kaŋ laaŋkwiiŋ fiɛɛ, ɛ bɛ tɛ̀ kaŋ liboo kituŋ, fiee fi nɛ gii nɛ fanchɛ laaŋkwiiŋ fiɛɛ, ɛ bɛ tɛ̀ fanchɛ liboo kituŋ.
Nse ntuuɔ ntiiti li be-eŋ chɛɛŋ le, ɛ bɛniiŋ bɛfɛ lɛ be-eŋ lɛnti beŋ li fiee li laaŋkwiiŋ, be lɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ, kɛ Baa wɛŋ wu nuuŋ liboo gii fɛ fi li bee.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le, fɛ bɛniiŋ bɛfɛ kɛ bɛtɛɛtu taashɛ li bukooŋ bweŋ, kɛ mi ŋ'we li bee linti.”
Pita kiiŋgi bii li Jiso laa, “Taa, ɛ kiŋga kimɛ ki ŋwaanɛŋ nuuŋ fɛ biee bibifi li mi-i, mfeeki wu? Nuuŋ gɛɛŋ bo si kiŋga mfomɛnyaaŋ ni?”
Jiso se tuu li wuu le, “Nnuuŋ ntɛ ntee wɛ le ɛ kiŋga mfomɛnyaaŋ kwaa kɛ. Nuuŋ ɔ feeki kiŋga gwii mfomɛnyaaŋ ntsɔ mfomɛnyaaŋ.
Ɛ nɛɛ lɛ si nuuŋ bɛ maa bumfɔŋ bu liboo bɛ mfɔŋ wumu wu tɛ̀ wɛki le nachɛ bɛ bɛniiŋ bee bɛ nimɛ kii kwa wee wu tɛ̀ kiri li tsaŋ yi bee.
Si tɛ̀ bɛchi le ni tɛɛti lɛ, be bɛ bɛ wi wumu wu fiɔɔ ye tɛ nuuŋ bɛnchuki yoofi.
Si yi tɛ̀ yaa wu soŋu lɛ, mfɔŋ wulu se tee le bɛ dzɔɔ wu bee kwɛsi mɔɔ bɔɔŋ mɔɔ biee biee bichu bɛ kabɛ bɛ bɛ kwa wulu bɛ sooŋ fiɔɔ ye lu.
Si mfɔŋ wulu tɛ̀ tee lɛ, wi wulu toŋ núŋ wu limfwe sooŋ bɔ li wuu tee le, ‘Taa, kɔɔ nshiiŋ bɛ mi, ŋgii nsooŋ wɛ fiee fichu.’
Nshiiŋ fɛ te kikoo we chinɛ li wuu daayɛ lɛ fiɔɔ yilu.
Se nuuŋ le, wi wɛ kibɛɛ bo le ni giiŋgi, gɛɛŋ chiiŋ wi wumu wu bee be tɛ̀ nindi li mfɔŋ wɛ-ɛ, ɛ tɛ̀ gii kɛmi wu fiɔɔ babi wu kwa mumkpaŋ. Biee cha wu fɛ we tee le, ‘Soŋɛ fiɔɔ ya.’
Wi wu nimɛ wulu se toŋ tɛ núŋ wu limfwe, lɛkɛ wu tee le, ‘Kɔɔ nshiiŋ bɛ mi, ŋgii nsooŋ fiɔɔ ya.’
Faaŋ, dzɔ wu gɛɛŋ bɛŋɛ wu li yih yi ncha-a le ni nuuŋ lu nsiiŋ fɛ wu sooŋ fiɔɔ ye.
Bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ bee be tɛ̀ nindi ŋɛŋ fiee fi ka, fi fieeŋgi be ŋge. Be gɛɛŋ be tee fiee fichu fi bee fi ka li mfɔŋ wɛ-ɛ.
Mfɔŋ sɔɔmi wu, tee li wuu le, ‘Ɛ wɛ wi wu bifi. Mbee ndaayɛ lɛ ya fiɔɔ li chichi kifɛ ɔ bee ɔ sooŋ bɔ li mi-i.
Bee nuuŋ ɔ kɔɔ tɛ nshiiŋ bɛ wi wulu nɛɛ si mbee ŋkɔɔ nshiiŋ bɛ wɛ tɛ’
Shéŋ tɔnyɛ mfɔŋ, nyɛ wu le bɛ fa wu li yih yi ncha-a, bɛ ni bɛ ŋ'wɛki bɛ wu gɛɛŋ bo fɛ wu naa wu sooŋ fiɔɔ ye chichi.
Ɛ nɛɛ lɛ si Baa wɛŋ wu nuuŋ liboo gii fɛ bɛ beŋ bɛchu, fɛ wi mɛɛŋ ki feeki kɛ bɛ shéŋ yee chichi li fiee fi bifi-i fi ŋwaani tuu fɛ li wuu kɛ.”
Le Jiso tee biee bini mɛɛshi, dza lɛ kimbɛ ki kwɛɛŋ wu Galilii, lenchi gɛɛŋ Judiya liwiŋ li kimbɛ ki Dzɔɔ yi Joodaaŋ.
Le gɛɛŋ lɛ, kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ banchɛ ki biki wu, wɔnchɛ be bɛchu bɛ tɛ̀ gendi fe.
Bɛfarasii dza be bɛ lɛ wuu le be mɔnchɛ wu, be bii li wuu laa, “Nchi beenchi le wi nuuŋ kooŋ bɛ kwɛsi kii fiee fimu, mɔɔ nuuŋ fi la le ni?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Nɛ mɛɛŋ baa saa ki teeŋ kɛ fiee fi bɛ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ le, ‘Fɛ mbɛɛchɛ, wi wu tɛ̀ tɔŋ bɛniiŋ tɛ̀ tɔŋ le be ni be nuuŋ nɛɛ nyuŋ bee kwɛɛŋ ni?’
Tɛ̀ tɔŋ be, tee le, ‘Ɛ kii fini fi nyuŋ gii naa shɛ tee bee ni, taashɛ bee kwɛsi, be bɛfɛ se to wi mumkpaŋ.’
Bɛdɛɛni, be mɛɛŋ yɛ bɛniiŋ bɛfɛ kɛ, be to baa wi mumkpaŋ. Fi se fiɛɛ le, fiee fi Nyɔ taashɛ, kiiŋ wi ni mɔŋ ŋgatinɛ kɛ.”
Bɛniiŋ bɛlu se tuu be bii li Jiso laa, “Se nuuŋ kii la fi Mɔɔsɛ tɛ̀ tee le wi nuuŋ tsɛɛ kiŋwaati nyɛ li kwɛsi ki doonchi le wu kooŋɔ bɛ wu, se kooŋ wu le?”
Jiso tuu le, “Fi tɛ̀ nuuŋ lɛ kii bikoo binɛ bi tɛɛmɛ bi Mɔɔsɛ tɛ̀ gɛɛ le wi nuuŋ kooŋ bɛ kwɛsi. Se nuuŋ le, ɛ lɛɛ si fi tɛ̀ nuuŋ lɛ fɛmbɛɛchɛ-ɛ kɛ.
Ntiitɔɔ fieŋ li be-eŋ le, ɛ wi kooŋ bɛ kwɛsi nuuŋ yɛ kii le wu kɔɔ ɔ kwɛɛŋ wulu bɛ nyuŋ wumu kɛ, ɛ wu dzɔ kwɛɛŋ wumu, kɛ wu giŋɔ bɛ kwɛɛ wi.”
Le bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ kintutu-u woo fini, be tee li wuu le, “Ɛ fini nuuŋ kii nyuŋ bee kwɛɛŋ lɛ, kɛ fi dzɔɔŋ le wi ba fi mwɛɛ kwerɛ, tɛ dzɔ kwɛɛŋ kɛ.”
Jiso se tee li bee le, “Se nuuŋ le ɛ wi kwikwi wu nuuŋ beŋ fini fiee kɛ. Ɛ nɛɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ Nyɔ fɛ le be beŋ kwaa.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le bɛniiŋ bamu baa lu bɛ kɛmi yɛ mbeechɛ kii kwɛɛŋ kɛ, fi fiɛɛ si bɛ tɛ̀ biɛ be be nuuŋ. Bamu se baa lɛ, nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ fɛ be bɔ le be ni be nuuŋ lɛ. Bamu baa tɛ fi bee lɛ, nuuŋ be bɛ fɛ bɛ yi yi bee le be ni be nuuŋ lɛ, kii bumfɔŋ bu liboo. Wi wu nuuŋ beŋ fini mwɛ beŋ.”
Bɛniiŋ tɛ̀ dza be bɛɛ bɛ bɔɔŋ lɛ Jiso-o le koŋ li bee, bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u wami be.
Jiso se tee fiee le, “Gɛɛ yɛɛŋ bɔɔŋ bɛlu ni be bɛɛ lɛ mi-i. Nɛ loosɛ kɛ be kɛ, kifɛ bumfɔŋ bu liboo bwɛɛ li bɛniiŋ si bani-i.”
Le tee lɛ, tiiŋ mwɛ li bee, dza giiŋgi.
Fi se ka le wumu tɛ̀ dza bɛ lɛ Jiso-o, bii li wuu laa, “Wi wu ntiifɛ, fiee fi dzeeŋ fi nnuuŋ mfɛ nse ŋkɛmɛ ntsɛ wu kimakɛ nuuŋ la?”
Jiso bii li wuu laa, “Ɔ biiti mi kii fiee fi dzeeŋ kii la? Wi wu dzeeŋ wɛ lu mumkpaŋ kwaa. Ɔɔ wɛki le ɔ naa ɔ kɛmɛ ntsɛ wu kimakɛ, ɔ kiri bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ.”
Wi wulu se bii li Jiso laa, “Bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ nuuŋ bɛ la?” Jiso tuu li wuu le, “Ɔ wo kɛ wi kɛ, ɔ giŋ kɛ bɛ kwɛɛ wi kɛ, ɔ yi kɛ biee kɛ, ɔ leŋ kɛ lɛ nsa wu binsɛɛ lɛ lɛjiŋ kɛ,
ɔ guundi chaa bee na, mɔɔ le, ɔ ni ɔ kɔŋgisi ŋwaana siɔ kɔŋgisi yi ya.”
Sɔɔnɛ wi wulu tuu tee li wuu le, “Ntɛ̀ ŋkiri bɛnchi bani bɛchu. Ɛ la fi se shɛ?”
Jiso tuu li wuu le, “Ɔɔ wɛki le ɔ ni ɔ nuuŋ wi wu dzeeŋ, ɔ gɛɛŋ ɔ kabɛ biee bi ɔ kɛmi bichu, ɔ gachɛ kwa wulu li bɛniiŋ bɛ kifoo lɛ, ɔ se kɛmɛ bulofu liboo. Ɔɔ fɛ lɛ ɔ se bɛ ɔ ni ɔ biki mi.”
Le sɔɔnɛ wi wulu woo lɛ, dza giiŋgi nshiiŋ nshiiŋ, kifɛ tɛ̀ gii kɛmi kwa ŋge.
Jiso se tuu tee li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u le, “Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, fi tɛɛmi fɛ wi wu kwa nuuŋ lɛ li bumfɔŋ bu liboo li.
Ntuu ntee beŋ tɛ le, fi nuuŋ tsɛkɛ fɛ kamɛɛ nuuŋ lɛ lɛ fiooŋ yi nsara, yɛki fɛ wi wu kwa nuuŋ lɛ li bumfɔŋ bu Nyɔ-ɔ.”
Le bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ kintutu-u woo fini, wa tɛ be ŋge. Be bii laa, “Ɛ fi nuuŋ lɛ, ɛ noo wu se gii bo lu?”
Jiso bichɛ be ni, tee li bee le, “Fi tɛɛmi nuuŋ bɛ wiwoŋ, bɛ Nyɔ fiee nuuŋ yɛ lu fi nuuŋ fi yaa yi kɛ.”
Pita tee li wuu le, “Bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ, tɛ shɛ baa biee bichu tɛ biki wɛ. Tɛ gii tɛ kɛmɛ la?”
Jiso tee li bee le, “Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, mfi wu Ŋwanɛwi gii naa shee li kabara we wu bunɔŋa, li kwɛɛŋ wu fwɛ-ɛŋ, beŋ bani bɛ biki mi, nɛ gii nɛ naa nɛ shee tɛ li bɛkabara yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ, nɛ ni nɛ sɛki bini bi Isɛlɛɛ bi yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛɛtu biɛɛ.
Wi kwi wu chinɛ la we, mɔɔ bɛŋwaani, bɛ dzɛ́mi yee, mɔɔ nuuŋ tee, mɔɔ nuuŋ ni, mɔɔ nuuŋ bɔɔŋ bee, kɛ yɛ́h yee, kii mi, gii kɛmɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ biee kiŋga gwii yɛki si tɛ̀ saa kɛmi. Se kɛmɛ tɛ ntsɛ wu kimakɛ.
Se nuuŋ le, bɛniiŋ ŋge bɛ nuuŋ limfwe dɛɛni gii be nuuŋ lɛjiŋ, bɛ ŋge bɛ nuuŋ lɛjiŋ dɛɛni to limfwe.”
Jiso tuu tee le, “Bumfɔŋ bu liboo bwɛɛ si te la wumu wu tɛ̀ dza taantaaŋ le gɛɛŋ dzɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ gɛɛ li wɛ wee li.
Si tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ ŋɛŋ be lɛ, bee be nachɛ le gii sooŋ be nchuki nchuki li jobɛ-ɛ. Se tuumi be, be gɛɛŋ be nindi li wuu wɛ.
Le ni nuuŋ si jobɛ bikaa mfomɛyoofi lɛ, bo gɛɛŋ ŋɛŋ bɛniiŋ bamu si be lemi fɛ waŋ li yee li.
Tee li bee le, ‘Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ tɛ nɛ niŋ li mi-i wɛ, ŋgii nsooŋ beŋ fiee fi kɔchɛ.’ Be biee be gɛɛŋ.
Le tuu bo nɛɛ si fɛnshaaŋ tsoo, fɛ nɛɛ lɛ, le gɛɛŋ bo nɛɛ tɛ si jobɛ bikaa bitɛɛtu lɛ, ka tuu dzɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ bamu.
Le tuu ni nuuŋ si jobɛ bikaa bitiinu lɛ fɛmfo-o lɛ, ka bo gɛɛŋ ŋɛŋ bɛniiŋ bamu be ŋgɛɛshi fɛ waŋ mfɛru fiee nsiŋ. Bii li bee laa, ‘Ɛ la fi nɛ bɛɛ nɛ shiiti nɛ ŋgɛɛshi fɛni jobɛ chichu li yee li ni?’
Be tuu le, ‘kifɛ wi mɛɛŋɔ ki dzɔ kɛ bee li nimɛ-ɛ kɛ.’ Se tee li bee le, ‘Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ tɛ nɛ ni nɛ nindi li mi-i wɛ.’
Le ni nuuŋ lɛ fɛmfo-o, te wɛ wulu bɛ tee li te kikoo wu bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ wɛ le teeŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ baa, nsooŋ be, bɛchi nsomfu nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ dzɔ lɛjiŋ, gɛɛŋ mɛɛshi bɛ bɛ ŋkosi.
Se bɛchi suundi be. Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ dzɔ li nimɛ-ɛ jobɛ bikaa bitiinu bɛ, sooŋ be nchuki nchuki.
Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ saa dzɔ baa tɛ̀ beechi le gii sooŋ be yaa bamu baa. Se nuuŋ le, tɛ̀ tuu sooŋ nɛɛ be nchuki nchuki.
Le be fi kinsomfu kibee, be bɛchi be ŋunyi te la wɛ,
be tiiti le, ‘Bɛniiŋ bani ɔ bee ɔ dzɔ be lɛjiŋ be niŋ baa kikaa ki mfi kimumkpaŋ kwaa, ɔ se tuu ɔ sooŋ tɛɛ be yɛɛŋ, nuuŋ bee tɛ be tɛ shi tɛ fieŋgi bɛ nimɛ jobɛ kimbiri, wiiŋ bɛndi bee fɛ fa.’
Te wɛ wulu tuu li wi wu be wumu le, ‘Sinɛŋ, mɛɛŋɔ mfɛ kɛ bubiɛɛ li wɛ-ɛ kɛ. Tɛ be tɛ nachɛ nɛɛ nimɛ chini li nchuki-i ni?
Dzɔɔ kinsomfu ko ɔ ni ɔ giiŋgi. Ɛ mi wu ŋkɔɔŋgi le nsooŋ wi wu lɛjiŋ yɛɛŋ si mi nsooŋ wɛ.
Ŋkɛmi nɛɛ buŋga bu fɛrɛ fiee fi ŋkɔŋgisi bɛ fiee fi nuuŋ nɛɛ fieŋ ni? Mɔɔ ɔ feti bukaaŋ kifɛ mi ŋgwiyɔɔ tsáŋ yɛŋ li bɛniiŋ li le?’”
Si Jiso tɛ̀ tee lɛ, biee mɛɛshi le, “Ɛ lɛ si bɛniiŋ bɛ nuuŋ lɛjiŋ dɛɛni gii be to limfwe, bɛ nuuŋ limfwe se to bɛ lɛjiŋ.”
Le Jiso ni yɛki Jɛrosalɛŋ le bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u bɛ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ baa bo lɛ dze, teeŋ be bee be cheekiyi, se tee li bee le,
“Yikɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ woo, tɛɛbeŋ yɛki baa tɛ giiŋgi Jɛrosalɛŋ bɛ gii bɛ gɛɛŋ bɛ nyɛ Ŋwanɛwi li tsaŋ yi bɛte muntofi-i bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, bɛ saa wu bɛ sondɛ le be wo wu,
bɛ biee bɛ nyɛ wu li tsaŋ yi bɛniiŋ bɛ nuuŋ yɛ Bɛjuu kɛɛ, be ni be kwɛrisi wu, be fiaamfiɛ wu bɛ muŋwaaŋ, bɛ taaŋ wu li kintaaŋ li kwi, ke bo jo taa Nyɔ kaari yi buu wu li kwe-e.”
Ni bɔɔŋ bɛ Dzɛbɛdii tɛ̀ dza bɛ lɛ Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee, toŋ núŋ wu limfwe le lɛkɛ fiee.
Jiso bii li wuu laa, “Ɔ wɛki nuuŋ la?” Se tee li wuu le, “Kaachɛ le ke mfi wu ɔ sɛki bumfɔŋ bwo, bɔɔŋ beŋ bɛ bɛfɛ bani shee li wɛ-ɛ lichiŋ, wumu lɛ kibɛnɛ ko ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ, wumu lɛ ki kimɛsɛ-ɛ.”
Se nuuŋ le, Jiso tuu li bɔɔŋ bɛlu le, “Nɛ kii yɛ fiee fi nɛ biiti kɛ. Nuuŋ nɛ woŋ fika fi ŋgɛ-ɛ fi ŋgii ŋ'woŋ fini ni?” Be tuu le, “Tɛ nuuŋ tɛ woŋ.”
Tee li bee le, “Chɛɛŋ nɛ gii nɛ woŋ fika fieŋ. Se nuuŋ le nshewu lɛ kibɛnɛ keŋ ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ bɛ ki kimɛsɛ nuuŋ yɛ kintsii keŋ le nyɛ li be-eŋ kɛ. Bintsii bilu nuuŋ li bɛniiŋ bɛ Baa wɛŋ nachɛ wu gɛɛ li bee.”
Le kiŋkɛ ki bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu-u bɛ Jiso bɛ yoofi baa woo kii fiee filu lɛ, shéŋ tɔnyɛ be bɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ bɛfɛ bɛlu.
Jiso se teeŋ be bɛchu, be bɛ tee li bee le, “Nɛ kii yɛ le bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki bitoŋ ti shiiti li bɛniiŋ bɛ bee, bɛniiŋ bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bee doonchi buŋga lɛ bee lɛ we ni?
Dɛɛni fiee fini kɛmi yɛ le fi nuuŋ lɛ be-eŋ lɛnti kɛ. Wi wu wɛki le ni nuuŋ wi wu nyɔŋa li be-eŋ linti kɛmɔɔ le ni nuuŋ wi wu nindi li be-eŋ.
Wi wu wɛki le ni nuuŋ wi wu limfwe li be-eŋ linti, kɛ mwɛ kɛmɔɔ le ni nuuŋ mfwa wunɛ.
Fi fiɛɛ yɛɛŋ le, Ŋwanɛwi tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki bɛ kɛ le bɛniiŋ ni be nindi li wuu kɛ. Tɛ̀ bɛ nuuŋ le niŋ li bɛniiŋ li, nyɛ ntsɛ we le ya bɛniiŋ ŋge li kwe-e.”
Le Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u gɛɛŋ be ni be kɛti Jɛriko, kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ banchɛ ki biki wu lɛjiŋ.
Fi se ka le binyɛɛ bimu bifɛ, nuuŋ buniŋ bɛ tɛ̀ bɛɛ be shiiti li ŋgemɛ yi dze-e, nuuŋ ɛ be woo le Jiso yɛkɔɔ, be bɛchi be dzɛŋgi be tiiti le, “Taa, Ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi-i, kɔɔ nshiiŋ bɛ bee.”
Kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ kɛɛ se wami be ki tiiti le shee yɛɛŋ nshiiŋ. Se nuuŋ le be tuu be wɛndi be giiŋgi bu limfwe le, “Taa, Ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi kɔɔ nshiiŋ bɛ bee.”
Jiso biee leŋ, teeŋ be, be bɛ, bii li bee laa, “Nɛ wɛki le mfɛ la li be-eŋ?”
Be tuu le, “Taa, fɛrɛ le lii yisɛŋ gwiyɛ.”
Nshiiŋ kɔɔ Jiso, koŋ li lii yi bee. Mfwaa mumkpaŋ be ŋɛŋ biee, be dza be biki Jiso.
Le Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u ni be fɛɛshi Jɛrosalɛŋ ɛ be bo li kitoŋ ki Bɛtfaj ki nuuŋ li Ŋkumɛ wu Biti bi Oli-if, biee toŋ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu bamu bɛfɛ,
tee li bee le, “Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ li kitoŋ ki limfwe kɛɛ. Ɛ nɛ gɛɛŋ, nɛ ŋɛŋ ni sɔmbwaa ɛ bɛ gerɛ, ŋwani nuuŋ li wuu lichiŋ, nɛ fanchɛ, nɛ bɛ mi bɛ wu.
Ɛ wi bii fiee li be-eŋ, nɛ tuu li wuu le Te Kikoo wɛkɔɔ wu, kɛ gii chinɛ le nɛ bɛ bɛ wu.”
Fini tɛ̀ ka lɛ le fi bɛ fi kɔchɛ si ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ wumu tɛ̀ tee, tiiti le,
“Tee li kitoŋ ki Sayɔŋ le. ‘Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, Mfɔŋ wunɛ bɛɛɔ lɛ be-eŋ. Wu shiikɔɔ yi yee fɛkwiiŋ, wu beeŋɔ lɛ sɔmbwaa li lɛwe, nuuŋ ŋwanɛ sɔmbwaa wu mɛɛŋ bwi.’”
Le bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ kintutu-u baa gɛɛŋ, be fɛ nɛɛ si tɛ tee.
Be se bɛ bɛ sɔmbwaa wulu mɔɔ ŋwaŋ, be lɔŋ ndú yibe li bee liwe, Jiso beeŋ shee lɛ wumu, giiŋgi.
Kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ kinɔŋa tɛ̀ gikisi ndú yibe lɛ dze, bamu bonyi yɛŋɛ yi biti be gikisi.
Kintutu ki tɛ̀ giiŋgi Jiso limfwe bɛ ki tɛ̀ biki lɛjiŋ kɛɛ tɛ̀ wuuyi le, “Yiyi-i yiyi-i yiyi-i, bunɔŋa bwɛɛ bu ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi looo! Nyɔ tiiŋ yɛ mwɛ li wi wu bɛɛ li bukooŋ bu Taa lɛ looo! Yiyi-i yiyi-i yiyi-i, bunɔŋa bwɛɛ bu Nyɔ yi nuuŋ liboo li looo!”
Le Jiso gɛɛŋ fɛsi Jɛrosalɛŋ kitoŋ kilu kichu sɛɛsɛ. Bɛniiŋ tɛki wa, be biiti laa, “Wuni nuuŋ noo le?”
Se kintutu kilu tuu ki tiiti le, “Ɛ ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ wu Jiso wu dza li kitoŋ ki Nasarɛ, li kwɛɛŋ wu Galilii.”
Jiso gɛɛŋ lɛ fɛ yih yi muntofi yi Nyɔ-ɔ, kooŋ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ tɛ̀ kabini biee mɔɔ bɛ tɛ̀ guti biee lu, bachɛ bidaŋ bi bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ fikisi kwa-a, bɛ bidaŋ bi bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kabini bibimu.
Tɛ kuŋgi be, tiiti le, “Fi fiɛɛ ɛ bɛ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ, Nyɔ tiiti le, ‘Bɛ gii bɛ ni bɛ teenyi yih yɛɛŋ le yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ.’ Nɛ fiiki baa yi to nuuŋ ntuuŋ wu bɛyi.”
Le Jiso ni nuuŋ fɛ yih yi muntofi yilu, binyɛɛ bɛ biŋkɛrɛ bɛ lɛ wuu wɔnchɛ be.
Se nuuŋ le, le bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ doonchi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ ŋɛŋ biee bi bimfimu wondini, bɛ si bɔɔŋ bɛ niiŋ niiŋ tɛ̀ wuuyi fɛ yih yi muntofi, be tiiti le, “Eeeee, kinɔŋa nuuŋ ki ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi leee,” fi tɔŋ be ŋge.
Be wamɛ Jiso laa, “Ɔ wuki yɛ fiee fi bɔɔŋ bani tiiti ni?” Tuu li bee le, “Iiŋ, ŋ'wukɔɔ. Fi fiɛɛ le nɛ mɛɛŋ baa saa ki teeŋ kɛ fiee fi bɛ tsɛɛ le, ‘Nyɔ gɛɛ yɛ jɛ yi buti li bimfimu bi bɔɔŋ bɛ bwi-i, mɔɔ li bimfimu bi bɔɔŋ bɛ mɛɛŋ be yɛɛndi mbeeŋ yi bɛ ni bɛ bee le be ni be piɛti wu lu?’”
Jiso dza shɛ be, bo li kitoŋ kilu, gɛɛŋ li kitoŋ ki Bɛtani-i, tsi fe.
Le ni nuuŋ fɛŋwɛɛŋ taantaaŋ, si Jiso tɛ̀ kaarisi tuu lijiŋ lɛ kitoŋ ki Jɛrosalɛŋ dzeeŋ tɛ̀ wuu wu.
Ŋɛŋ kiti kimu li dzee lichiŋ ki bɛ ti jii muntaaŋ mulu, gɛɛŋ fe, bɛdɛɛni ti mɛɛŋ ki ŋɛŋ kɛ fiee li ki-i kɛ, ŋɛŋ nuuŋ bibɛ kwaa li ki-i, tsoŋ kiti kilu, chini li ki-i le kiiŋ fintaaŋ ni naa tuu fi woŋ li wɛ-ɛ kɛ! Mfwaa mumkpaŋ, kiti kilu biee ki wɔɔbɛ.
Le bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu bɛ Jiso ŋɛŋ lɛ, bimfimu wondɛ be. Be se ta maa laa, “Kiti kilu geeŋ ki wɔɔbɛ mfwaa mumkpaŋ ni le?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ chɛɛŋ le, ɛ nɛ gɛɛ shéŋ li Nyɔ-ɔ, mɛŋinɛ siŋ, nɛ tɛ̀ fɛ fiee fi mi mfɛ bɛ kiti kini kwaa kɛ. Ɛ nɛ tee li ŋkumɛ wuni le, ‘Dzatsɛ fɛni ɔ gɛɛŋ ɔ we li dzɔɔ yi nyɔŋa,’ fi ka lɛ.
Mɔɔ nuuŋ la fi nɛ lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ le, kɛ nɛ gii nɛ kɛmɛ, laa nɛ gɛɛ baa shéŋ li Nyɔ-ɔ kwaa le.”
Jiso tɛ̀ kaari lɛ li yih yi muntofi-i, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ wu Bɛjuu bɛ be ŋɛŋ si tiifi bɛniiŋ, be bii li wu laa, “Ɔ dzɔ buŋga bu ɔ feti biee bini fɛŋ? Ɛ noo wu nyɛ buŋga bulu li wɛ-ɛ?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Ŋgii mbii tɛ fiee li be-eŋ, ɛ nɛ tuu, nse ntee beŋ wi wu nyɛ buŋga li mi-i le ni mfeti biee bini.
Jɔɔŋ tɛ̀ lisi bɛniiŋ li dzɔɔ, buŋga bulu buti nuuŋ fɛŋ? Ɛ Nyɔ yi tɛ̀ nyɛ wu liboo, mɔɔ wiwoŋ le?” Le bii lɛ, be tɛchɛ bebe, be tiiti le, “Ɛ tɛ tuu le ɛ Nyɔ yi tɛ̀ nyɛ, tuu bii li bee li laa, fi ge la fi tɛ̀ ti mɛɛŋ ki beŋ kɛ li Jɔɔŋ li kɛ le?
Se nuuŋ le, ɛ tɛ tuu le, ‘Ɛ wiwoŋ wu tɛ̀ nyɛ,’ kɛ tɛ chɛndi baa kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ, si be bɛchu beenchi baa le Jɔɔŋ tɛ̀ nuuŋ ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ.”
Nɛɛ lɛ, be se tuu li Jiso le, “Tɛ kii yɛ kɛ.” Jiso se tuu tee li be le, “Kɛ nuuŋ ntɛ ntee tɛ beŋ wi wu nyɛ mi buŋga le ni mfeti biee bini kɛ.”
Jiso gɛɛŋ limfwe bii laa, “Nɛ beechi le la kii fini? Wi wumu tɛ̀ kɛmi bɔɔŋ bee bɛ buniŋ bɛfɛ. Dza gɛɛŋ fɛ ŋwaŋ wu kaaŋ li, tee li wuu le, ‘Ŋwanɛŋ, gɛnɛ ɔ shi ɔ ni ɔ nindi liwɛ bɛŋ.’
Ŋwaŋ wulu tuu li wuu le, ‘Nnuuŋ ntɛ ŋgɛɛŋ kɛ.’ Se nuuŋ le dza tuu beechɛ li shéŋ yee li gɛɛŋ liwɛ lɔɔ.
Wi wulu tuu dza gɛɛŋ fɛ ŋwani wu lɛjiŋ tee nɛɛ fiee fi bee tee li wu kaaŋ wɛɛ, tuu li wuu le ‘Ŋgii ŋgɛɛŋ taa.’ Se nuuŋ le, ba ŋgɛnu nsiŋ
Li bɔɔŋ bɛ bɛfɛ bani linti, ɛ wu la wu tɛ̀ fɛ fiee fi tee tɛ̀ gii kɔŋgisi?” Be tuu le, “Ɛ wu kaaŋ wɛ.” Jiso se tee li bee le, “Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, bɛniiŋ bɛ kundi biŋwaati mɔɔ binjiŋkwiiŋ lii baa lɛ bumfɔŋ bu Nyɔ-ɔ limfwe li be-eŋ.
Ntiitɔɔ ni kifɛ Jɔɔŋ tɛ̀ lisi bɛniiŋ li dzɔɔ le doonchɛ dze yi tsaaŋ li be-eŋ, nɛ faaŋ mbeenchɛ li wuu. Se nuuŋ le, bɛniiŋ bɛ kundi kiŋwaati bɛ binjiŋkwiiŋ tɛ̀ beŋ li wuu. Nɛ se tuu nɛ ŋɛŋ si be beŋ lɛ, nɛ faaŋ tɛ mfikisɛ shéŋ yinɛ le nɛ beŋ tɛ li wuu.”
Jiso tuu kweeŋ le, “Tuu woo yɛɛŋ ŋgaŋgaa chimu. Wi wumu tɛ̀ niŋ wɛ wu muntaaŋ mu bɛ feti mbiiŋ lu, toŋ mbaŋ kɛnɛ, chiŋ kisɔ ki bɛ gii bɛ ni bɛ kee muntaaŋ mulu bɛ seendi le, mbiiŋ se buti, gwaŋ kikɔ ki wi wu kiichi wɛ wulu, shɛ wɛ wulu li bɛniiŋ li, dza gɛɛŋ li kitoŋ kimu.
Mfi wu bɛ ti kee muntaaŋ mulu tɛ̀ bɛ kɔchɛ, toŋ bɛniiŋ bee bɛ nimɛ lɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ shɛ wɛ li bee baa, le be gɛɛŋ be fi mwee muntaaŋ.
Be gɛɛŋ, bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ shɛ wɛ li bee baa kɔɔ be, be too wumu, be wo wumu, be tomɛ wumu bɛ ta.
Tuu toŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ bamu be yaŋ be yaa bɛ ŋkosi baa, bɛniiŋ baa tuu be fɛ nɛɛ si be be be fɛ bɛ bɛ ŋkosi baa lɛ.
Lɛjiŋ lɛlu, toŋ nuuŋ ŋwani kibɛɛ, beechi le be gii be guuŋ ŋwani wuni.
Se nuuŋ le, le gɛɛŋ, bɛniiŋ bɛlu ŋɛŋ wu, be tee bebe le, ‘Wuni wɛ nuuŋ kinjila ki wi wu wɛ wuni. Bɛ yɛɛŋ tɛ wo wu tɛ ji bishɛyɛ bilu.’
Be kɔɔ wu be buu wu li wɛ wulu, be wo wu.”
Si Jiso tɛ̀ tee ni, tuu bii laa, “Wi wu wɛ wulu gii ge la bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛlu fɛ wu bɛ?”
Be tuu le, “Gii bɛ mɛɛshi bɛ munyaminɛ mulu mu kwiyɛ, shɛ wɛ wulu li bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ gii be nyɛ wu mwee muntaaŋ mfi wu be kɔ.”
Jiso se bii li bee laa, “Nɛ ti mɛɛŋ ki teeŋ kɛ lɛ kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ le, ‘Tɛtɛ chi bɛniiŋ bɛ ŋgwanu-u tɛ̀ faaŋ chɛɛ, chi kaari chɛɛ chi to tɛtɛ chi fɛ boo chi yi ni? Mɔɔ fini nuuŋ mfɛru wu Taa, bɛniiŋ bichi be tɛti maa ni’?
Ntusɔɔ ntiiti li be-eŋ le, Nyɔ gii yi fi bumfɔŋ bwee li tsaŋ yinɛ-ɛ, yi nyɛ nuuŋ li bɛniiŋ bɛ gii be gbɛɛŋ be ni be feti si bɛniiŋ bɛ li kwɛɛŋ wɛɛ.”
[Tɛtɛ chilu chini nuuŋ ɛ chi we li wi-i mwɛ chaafɛ, ɛ wi we li chi-i, mwɛ fwachɛ.]
Si Jiso tɛ̀ wa ŋgaŋgaa chilu lɛ, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa mɔɔ Bɛfarasii woo lɛ, be kɛɛ le wu wa wɛ nuuŋ kii be.
Be dza be wɛki le be kɔɔ wu, se nuuŋ le be kaari be chɛŋ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ, kifɛ kintutu kilu tɛ kɛmi li Jiso le ni nuuŋ ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ.
Jiso tɛ̀ yeti li bee lɛ ŋgaŋgaa li, chimu tɛ̀ nuuŋ le
“Bumfɔŋ bu liboo nuuŋ bɛ maa bu bɛ mfɔŋ wumu wu tɛ̀ nachɛ tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ bu ŋwani wu nyu-uŋ.
Toŋ bɛnchindaa bee le be gɛɛŋ be teeŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ teeŋ le be bɛ tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ baa le be bɛ. Se nuuŋ le, bɛnchindaa bɛlu gɛɛŋ bɛniiŋ bɛlu faaŋ mbɛ.
Tuu toŋ bɛnchindaa bamu tee li bee le, ‘Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ni tiiti li bɛniiŋ bɛ ntuu ntee le be bɛ tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ chini le be yikɛ be woo, le mi mfɛɔ biee bijɛ kituŋ, mi nsɛɔ bintomu bi bɔɔŋ bɛ bɛnaŋ lɛ bi fɔɔŋ. Mi nachɔɔ biee bichu kituŋ, le be bɛ fɛ tsɔnɔ-ɔ.’
Se nuuŋ le, be gɛɛŋ bɛniiŋ bɛlu nyaami, be dza fibee be giiŋgi. Wi wumu la liwɛ, wi wumu bo waŋ wee.
Kiŋkɛ ki bɛniiŋ lɛ kɔɔ bɛnchindaa bɛlu be ŋwɛɛ bɛ be, be wooyɛ be.
Shéŋ tɔnyɛ mfɔŋ wulu, tuumi bɛniiŋ bee bɛ dzi-iŋ, be gɛɛŋ be lɛɛshɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ wooyɛ bɛnchindaa bee baa dududu, be tɔŋ kitoŋ kibee kilu.
Si tɛ̀ fɛ lɛ, tuu tee li bɛniiŋ bee bɛ nimɛ-ɛ bamu le, ‘Mi mfɛɔ tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ kituŋ. Se nuuŋ le bɛniiŋ bɛ ntuu nteeŋ baa tuu nuuŋ yɛ bɛniiŋ kɛ.
Dɛɛni, gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ lɛ dzé ntasɛ chi, nɛ teeŋ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ nɛ ŋɛŋ, le be bɛ fɛ tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ chini.’
Bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ bɛlu bo be gɛɛŋ lɛ dze chichi, be konchɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ be tɛ̀ ŋɛŋ, bɛniiŋ bɛ dzeeŋ bɛ bɛ bifi be bɛ. Yih yi bugoo yisɛ bɛ bɛniiŋ.
Mfɔŋ dza lɛ li yih yi bugoo yilu-u ŋɛŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ bɛ fɛ tsɔnɔ chilu-u, ŋɛŋ wi wumu lu mwɛ mɛɛŋ ki lii kɛ ndu yi tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ kɛ.
Bii li wuu laa, ‘Sinɛŋ, ɔ geeŋ ɔ lɛ luuŋ yih ndu yi tsɔnɔ nsiŋ?’ Wi wulu ba nshiiŋ.
Bɛdɛɛni, mfɔŋ wulu biee tee li bɛniiŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ baa le, ‘Kanɛ yɛɛŋ bibɛnu biee mɔɔ bikaa biee nɛ lɔŋ wu li kijibɛ lɛkuuŋ, fɛ bɛniiŋ dii be jii ŋgesi.’”
Si Jiso tɛ̀ tee lɛ, tee le, “Nɛ kɛɛ le, Nyɔ nuuŋ yi teeŋ bɛniiŋ ŋge, se nuuŋ le, ɛ bɛ niiŋ bɛ yi tsɛki.”
Bɛfarasii dza be gɛɛŋ be nachɛ si nuuŋ be fɛ Jiso lɔɔŋgɛ bɛ n'yɔru be se kɔɔ wu.
Be se toŋ bɔɔŋ bɛ bee bɛ kintutu-u mɔɔ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ bɛ Mfɔŋ Hɛrɔ fɛ Jiso. Be gɛɛŋ be tee li wuu le, “Wi wu ntiifɛ tɛ kii nɛɛ le ɔ nuuŋ wi wu chɛɛŋ, ɔ ti tiifi bɛniiŋ lɛ dze yi chɛɛŋ li. Ɔ ti dzeti yɛ le wi wumu nuuŋ chichi kɛ, kifɛ ɔ ti bichi yɛ wi li fiee fi mwɛ nuuŋ lu kɛ.
Dɛɛni, tee bee wa mbeechɛ. Nchi beŋ le tɛ ni tɛ suuti kiŋwaati li Kaisa mfɔŋ wu Lo-om, mɔɔ tɛ soo kɛ le?”
Jiso kɛɛ fiee fi be gwenini bɛ fi, biee tee li bee le, “Beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i bani, nɛ teeki mi kii la?
Bɛ yɛɛŋ bɛ kwa wu nɛ shiiŋ nɛ suuti kiŋwaati lu wɛ-ɛ ŋɛŋ.” Be bɛ bɛ danali, be nyɛ li wuu.
Jiso bii li bee laa, “Kikoo kini nuuŋ ki noo lɛ? Bukooŋ buni nuuŋ bu noo lɛ?”
Be tuu le, “Ɛ ki Kaisa, bukooŋ nuuŋ nɛɛ tɛ bwee.” Jiso tuu tee li bee le, “Nɛ nyɛɛ li Kaisa fiee fi nuuŋ fi Kaisa, nɛ nyɛɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ fi nuuŋ fi Nyɔ-ɔ.”
Le be woo lɛ, bimfimu wondɛ be. Be chinɛ li wuu dza giiŋgi.
Nɛɛ booyaa, Bɛsadusii tɛ̀ dza be bɛ fɛ Jiso-o. Bɛsadusii nuuŋ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ shiiŋ be kweŋgi le bɛniiŋ nuuŋ tɛ naa bo li kwe-e kɛ. Si be tɛ̀ bɛ lɛ, be bii li Jiso-o laa,
“Wi wu ntiifɛ, Mɔɔsɛ tɛ̀ tee le, ‘Ɛ wi kwi ŋkɛmɛ ŋwaŋ nsiŋ, kɛ ŋwaani kɛmi le dzɔɔ kwɛsi bee wu biɛ bɔɔŋ li bukooŋ bu ŋku ŋwaani wulu.’
Dɛɛni, bɔɔŋ bɛ wi wumu tɛ̀ tsiiŋ bɛ bee fɛni mfomɛnyaaŋ. Wu kaaŋ tɛ̀ dzɔ kwɛɛŋ, kwi bee wu ŋkɛmɛ ŋwaŋ siŋ, shɛ kwɛsi li ŋwaani wu biki li wuu.
Fi ka nɛɛ tɛ lɛ bɛ wu biki mɔɔ wu tɛ tuu biki, gɛɛŋ bo li wu mfomɛnyaaŋ li be kwi yɛ ŋkɛmɛ ŋwaŋ siŋ.
Lɛjiŋ lɛlu, kwɛɛŋ wulu kwi tɛ.
Lɛ dɛɛni, si be bɛchu bɛ mfomɛnyaaŋ baa tɛ̀ dzɔ kwɛɛŋ wulu lɛ, gii naa ni nuuŋ mfi wu bɛniiŋ buti li kwe-e, kwɛɛŋ wulu nuuŋ kwɛɛ noo?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Nɛ chaŋ baa ŋge, kifɛ nɛ kii yɛ fiee fi bɛ tsɛɛ lɛ Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ kɛ. Nɛ ti kii yɛ tɛ buŋga bu Nyɔ-ɔ kɛ.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le naa nuuŋ mfi wu bɛniiŋ buti li kwe-e, buniŋ bee bukɛɛŋ tɛ tuu le be ni be feti bugoo kɛ, bɛniiŋ mɛɛŋ yɛ be tuu be ni be nyɛɛ bɔɔŋ li bugoo li kɛ. Be gii naa be ni be nuuŋ nɛɛ si bɛnchindaa bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ liboo.
Ɛ nuuŋ kii mbochu wu bɛniiŋ gii naa be ni be buti li kwe-e, nɛ tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki teeŋ kɛ Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ nɛ woo fiee fi ki tiiti li be-eŋ ni? Nyɔ tɛ̀ tee le,
‘Ɛ mi Nyɔ yi Abrahaŋ bɛ Nyɔ yi Adzi mɔɔ Nyɔ yi Yakɔ.’ Fi nuuŋ le Nyɔ nuuŋ yɛ Nyɔ yi bɛŋku kɛ, yi nuuŋ Nyɔ yi bɛniiŋ bɛ nuuŋ bɛ yoŋ.”
Kintutu ki tɛ̀ lemi fe woo ntusu wu Jiso tɛ̀ tuu, wa tɛ̀ be bɛ ntiifɛ we.
Le Bɛfarasii woo le Jiso makɛ wɛ bimfimu bi Bɛsadusii, be banchɛ yi be bɛ fɛ wuu.
Wi wumu wu tɛ̀ gbɛŋgi kii bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, mɔnchɛ wu bɛ mbifu wumu le,
“Wi ntiifɛ, nchi wu ko wu yaa bɛnchi bɛchu nuuŋ wu la?”
Jiso tuu li wuu le, “Nchi wu ko nuuŋ wu tiiti le, ‘Ɔ kɔŋgisi Chaa yi Nyɔ ya bɛ shéŋ ya chi, ɔ nyɛɛ yi ya li yi-i ɔ giki bufii bwo li yi-i buchu.’
Wuni nuuŋ nchi wu limfwe wu ko wu yaa bɛnchi bɛchu.
Wu biki se nuuŋ nɛɛ si wɛɛ. Wu nuuŋ le, ‘Ɔ kɔŋgisi ŋwaana siɔ kɔŋgisi yi ya.’
Biee bichu bi nuuŋ lɛ kiŋwaati ki bɛnchi, mɔɔ bi nuuŋ lɛ Biŋwaati bi bɛntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, bi lemi li bɛnchi bɛ bɛfɛ bani-i.”
Si Bɛfarasii tɛ̀ taashɛ fe lɛ, Jiso dza bii mbifu wumu li bee laa,
“Nɛ beechi le la kii Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ? Nɛ beechi le ɛ ŋwanɛ noo?” Be tuu li wu le, “Nuuŋ ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi-i.”
Jiso se kaari bii li bee laa, “Si nuuŋ ŋwanɛ kini ki Mfɔŋ Daafi-i lɛ, fi geeŋ fi Fiana yi Nyɔ fɛ Mfɔŋ Daafi se teenyi wu le Taa? Daafi tɛ̀ tee le,
‘Taa Nyɔ tɛ̀ tee li Taa li le shee lɛ kibɛnɛ keŋ ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ, gɛɛŋ bo mfi wu ŋgii gɛɛ bɛniiŋ bo bɛ mbani-i ɔ tɔmi bikaa bio li bee.’
Ɛ Daafi teenyi wu le Taa, fi geeŋ se tuu ni nuuŋ ŋwani?”
Si Jiso tɛ̀ yɔ lɛ, wi tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki kɛmɛ kɛ fiee fi tusɛ li wuu kɛ. Mbɛɛchɛ booyaa, wi ti mɛɛŋ ki tuu kɛ mɔɔ le bii fiee li wuu kɛ.
Jiso dza tee li kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ bɛ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u le,
“Bɛniiŋ bɛ doonchi bɛnchi mɔɔ Bɛfarasii nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ dzɔ kintindɛ ki Mɔɔsɛ.
Fi se nuuŋ le, nɛ ni nɛ wuki fiee fichu fi bɛ tee li be-eŋ, nɛ feti. Se nuuŋ le, nɛ fɛ kɛ fiee fichu fi be feti kɛ, kifɛ be nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i.
Be dzɛti be yekɛ bɛntɛ bɛ yɛki buŋga bu bɛniiŋ lɛ be yiki bɛniiŋ bɛ be, be kibɛɛ tɛ mɔɔ mɔŋ le be laa tsaŋ le be fi be kɛ.
Biee bi be feti bichu nuuŋ nɛɛ le be fɛ le bɛniiŋ ŋɛŋ be. Muŋko mu bee mu Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ ko ŋge. Munshɛŋgɛ mu yooŋ yi ndú yi bee nuuŋ mu ndeeŋ.
Be ti giiŋgi fɛ tsɔnɔ-ɔ be kɔŋgisi nshewu nuuŋ fɛ bɛniiŋ guundi be, ɛ be gɛɛŋ li yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ be kɔŋgisi nshewu nuuŋ li bintindu bi limfwe-e.
Be ti kɔŋgisi ndɛndɛ fɛ waŋ le bɛniiŋ ni be yɛɛshi be, be kɔŋgisi le bɛniiŋ ni be teenyi be le Bɛlabi.
Se nuuŋ le, kiiŋ wi ni beenchi le bɛniiŋ ni be teenyi wu le Labi kɛ, kifɛ nɛ kɛmi Wi wu Ntiifɛ nuuŋ nɛɛ mumkpaŋ kwaa, beŋ bɛchu baa wi bee ŋwaani.
Kiiŋ nɛ ni nɛ teenyi wi wumu li nshɛ yini le ɛ wu Baa wunɛ kɛ, kifɛ nɛ kɛmi Baa wunɛ mumkpaŋ wu nuuŋ liboo.
Kiiŋ wi ni beŋ le bɛ ni bɛ teenyi wu le Te Kikoo kɛ, kifɛ Te Kikoo wunɛ nuuŋ mumkpaŋ kwaa, wu nuuŋ Krai Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ Kaachɛ.
Wi wu nyɔŋa lɛ be-eŋ lɛnti kɛmi le ni nuuŋ wi wu nindi li be-eŋ.
Wi kwikwi wu tsakisi yi yee, Nyɔ gii yi shiiki wu, wi kwikwi wu shiiki yi yee, Nyɔ gii yi tsaaki wu.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ, beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ lemi bɛniiŋ lii, nɛ baanyi dze yi lii li bumfɔŋ bu liboo. Beŋ kibɛɛ nɛ kɔŋgisi yɛ nlɛ lu kɛ, nɛ tuu nɛ baŋgi dze li bɛniiŋ bɛ kɔŋgisi nlɛ lu-u. [
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ, beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ gbɛŋgi nɛ fieŋgisi bukɛɛŋ bɛɛŋku-u, nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ wunɛ deendi le nɛ doonchɛ yi. Nɛ ni nɛ kii le wunɛ ŋgɛ gii naa bee.]
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ dzɛti nɛ dɛndɛ kwɛɛŋ wuni kwikwi nɛ lenchi dzɔ́ɔ yi nyɔŋa yi nyɔŋa le nɛ wɛki baa wi wu mumkpaŋ wu gii fiiki shéŋ to wi wunɛ wu kimbeenchɛ-ɛ. Ɛ wu fiiki lɛ, nɛ tuu nɛ fɛ wu mɛɛshi bee bubefu yaa mɔɔ wi wu gɛɛŋ fɛ wi wu duti nyimu si-iŋ, se tuu nuuŋ wi wu nyɔŋa nɛɛ si beŋ tɛ.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ. Nɛ baa binyɛɛ nɛ kweŋgi le nɛ doonchi baa dzé li bɛniiŋ li! Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ kweŋgi le, ‘Ɛ wi tee fiee, wu chini li bukooŋ bu yih yi muntofi, kɛ fi nuuŋ yɛ nɛɛ fiee kɛ. Se nuuŋ le, ɛ wi tee fiee wu chini nuuŋ li bukooŋ bu kikwa ki kwa-a li yih yi muntofi-i, kɛ kɛmɔɔ le fɛ si wu tee wu chini lɛ.’
Binyɛɛ bini! Nɛ baa bibere! Fiee fi ko fi yaa fimu nuuŋ fi la? Fi ŋge nuuŋ kikwa ki kwa-a mɔɔ yih yi muntofi yi feti se kikwa kilu tuu ki nuuŋ fiee fi nuuŋ fi Nyɔ-ɔ le?
Nɛ kweŋgi tɛ le, ‘Ɛ wi tee fiee wu chini li bukooŋ bu taantaa chi muntofi-i, kɛ fi nuuŋ yɛ tɛ fiee kɛ. Se nuuŋ le, ɛ wi tee fiee wu chini nuuŋ li bukooŋ bu fiee fi wi fɛ muntofi lu, kɛ kɛmɔɔ le fɛ si wu tee wu chini lɛ.’
Binyɛɛ bini! Fiee fi ko fi yaa fimu nuuŋ fi la? Fi ŋge nuuŋ nya yilu mɔɔ taantaa chi muntofi-i chi wu fɛ se nya yilu nuuŋ fiee fi nuuŋ fi Nyɔ-ɔ le?
Fiee fi nuuŋ lu fiɛɛ le ɛ wi chini li bukooŋ bu taantaa chi muntofi-i, kɛ wu chinɔɔ nɛɛ lɛ mɔɔ li biee bichu bi nuuŋ lu-u.
Ɛ wi chini li bukooŋ bu yih yi muntofi-i, kɛ wu chinɔɔ li yih yilu mɔɔ li Nyɔ-ɔ yi ntsiiŋ lu-u.
Ɛ wi chini li kwɛɛŋ wu liboo li, kɛ wu chinɔɔ tɛ nuuŋ li kabara wu Nyɔ-ɔ mɔɔ li Nyɔ yi shiiti lu.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ ti nyɛɛ kimbɛ kimumkpaŋ li Nyɔ-ɔ lɛnti lɛ bimbe yoofi-i bi bɛŋɔ bɛ nɛ keeti nɛ giki lɛ mbasi le yi ni yi yiki, nɛ tuu nɛ fɛŋgi fiee fi luuti fi nchi tiiti kii fi le nɛ ni nɛ feti, fi nuuŋ le nɛ ni nɛ feti biee bi tsaaŋ li bɛniiŋ li, nɛ keeti nshiiŋ li bɛniiŋ li mɔɔ le nɛ gɛɛ shéŋ li Nyɔ-ɔ. Nɛ kɛmi le nɛ fɛ biee bilu bichu nɛ tɛ shɛ fimu kɛ.
Binyɛɛ bi doonchi dzé li bɛniiŋ bamu bini! Nɛ kɔŋgisi mbusu finyunyu lɛ mbiiŋ li, se nuuŋ le, nɛ tuu nɛ miyi nyaŋ yi nyɔŋa lɛ shéŋ!
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ, beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ tsootsi muka bɛ shó bwiŋ kwaa, se nuuŋ le, biee yisɛ biɛɛ le nuuŋ bi nɛ lɔchi li bɛniiŋ li mɔɔ bi lii yinɛ funyi.
Binyɛɛ bi Bɛfarasii, saa yɛɛŋ nɛ tsootsɛ muka bɛ shó lɛnti kwɛ, se mu ni mu wuuti tɛ li bwiŋ.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ, beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ baa si dzíŋ yi bɛ nachɛ bɛ fwa yi to ncherere yi yeŋgi lii bujɔŋ, se nuuŋ le, lɛnti lɛlu nuuŋ ɛ le yisɛ bɛ biŋkomfu bi gooŋ yi bɛniiŋ lɛ mɔɔ biee bi nyɛndi bichu.
Ɛ lɛ si nɛ gwiyi baa lii le nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ tsaaŋ, se nuuŋ le, lɛnti laa ɛ le yisɛ bɛ kimfi mɔɔ biee bifi bi fɛrɛ.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ wunɛ, beŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ beŋ Bɛfarasii. Nɛ baa bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i! Nɛ gwɛndi dzíŋ yi bɛ ntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, nɛ nachi tɛ dzíŋ yi bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ tsiiŋ ntsɛ wu tsaaŋ, nɛ nachi yi dzeeŋ.
Nɛ feti lɛ nɛ doonchi le, ‘Gii nuuŋ le tɛ ni tɛ nuuŋ lu li mfi wu bɛtaa bɛsɛŋ wɛɛ, gii tɛ lemi yɛ fisɛŋ fɛ fiee fi be tɛ̀ feti le bɛ ni bɛ woyi bɛ ntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ fiɛɛ kɛ.’
Nɛ tiiti baa lɛ, nɛ tiiti nuuŋ kii bikoo binɛ nɛ tuu nɛ teendi bɛ bimfimu binɛ le nɛ baa nuuŋ bɔɔŋ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ woyɛ bɛ ntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ baa.
Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ limfwe, nɛ mɛɛshi nimɛ chi bɛchaa bɛnɛ tɛ̀ bɛchi!
Yɔ́ yini! Kiŋgɔkɛ ki mu faa lɛ kini! Nɛ beechi le bɛ nuuŋ tɛ naa gɛɛ beŋ fɛ wi wu nyɔŋa-a kɛ ni?
Si fi nuuŋ lɛ, mi nse ntuuɔ mi ntoŋ bɛ ntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ lɛ be-eŋ mɔɔ lɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ bufii lɛ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi. Nɛ gii nɛ naa nɛ woyɛ bamu, nɛ tayɛ bamu li bintaaŋ li nɛ fiaaŋ bamu li yih yinɛ yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ, nɛ beeŋ bikaa lɛ bamu jiŋ bintsii bichu bi be giiŋgi li bi-i.
Nɛ gii ke nɛ fɛ lɛ se ŋgɔŋ mɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ tɛ̀ tsiiŋ ntsɛ wu tsaaŋ li nshɛ yini-i bɛ bɛ tɛ̀ woyɛ, nuuŋ fɛ benɛ fa. Ngɔŋ mani gii naa me nuuŋ fɛ benɛ fa mbɛɛchɛ li mɛ Abɛ wu bɛ tɛ̀ wo nchɔru fiee nsiŋ, mbɛ mbochu li mɛ Sakariya wu ŋwanɛ Belekayɛ wu nɛ tɛ̀ wo kintikinti ki yih yi muntofi-i bɛ taantaa chi muntofi-i.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, mudzɔŋ mu biee bini bichu gii mu kɔɔ kiŋgɔkɛ ki dɛɛni kini kichu.”
Le Jiso yɔ ni, bɛɛni yi le, “Hebee Jɛrosalɛŋ! Hebee Jɛrosalɛŋ! Wɛ wu woyi bɛ ntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, ɔ tuu ɔ tomi bɛniiŋ bɛ Nyɔ tuumi li wɛ-ɛ bɛ ta! Ɛ kiŋga kimɛ ki mi ŋgwɛnɔɔ le mbanchɛ bɔɔŋ bo nɛɛ si ni shee ti banchi bɔɔŋ bee foochɛ bɛ bibɛ biee lɛ, ɔ se tuu ɔ faaŋ?
Bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ, bɛ chinɛ baa yih ya, yi gii yi to kichiiyɛ.
Ntiitɔɔ tɛ li wɛ-ɛ le ɔ mɛɛŋ yɛ le ɔ tuu ɔ ŋɛŋ mi kɛ, ŋgɛnu mbochu mfi wu ɔ gii naa ɔ tee le, ‘Nyɔ tiiŋ yɛ mwɛ li wi wu bɛɛ li bukooŋ bu Taa Nyɔ-ɔ.’”
Le Jiso bo li yih yi muntofi-i, ni giiŋgi, bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu kiiŋgi be bɛ li wuu lichiŋ be doonchi yíh yi fɛ yih yi muntofi-i li wuu.
Se nuuŋ le, Jiso tuu tee li bee le, “Nɛ ŋɛŋ baa yíh yini ni? Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le tɛtɛ chi mumkpaŋ nuuŋ tɛ shɛ li chimu liwe bɛ mɛɛŋ ki bachɛ kɛ chi fɛkwiiŋ nsiŋ kɛ.”
Le Jiso gɛɛŋ miri shee li Ŋkumɛ wu Biti bi Oli-if, bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u kiiŋgi bebe, be bɛ fɛ wuu be bii laa, “Tee bee mfi wu biee bini gii bi yenɛ, bɛ fiee fi gii fi doonchɛ mfi wu ɔ gii ɔ kaari ɔ bɛ, ɔ se tuu ɔ tee bee mfi wu ntsɛ wu li nshɛ yini-i gii ma?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Ŋɛŋ yɛɛŋ le kiiŋ wi ni yɛɛŋ bɛ beŋ nɛ taŋ dze kɛ.
Nɛ kɛɛ le bɛniiŋ ŋge gii be bɛ be dzɔɔ bukooŋ bweŋ be gɛɛ limfwe, wi ni kweŋgi le ɛ wu Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ. Mfi wu be gii be ni be feti lɛ, be gii be ni be yɛŋgi bɛ bɛniiŋ ŋge be tɛndi dzé.
Nɛ gii nɛ woo bɛ tundi dziŋ, nɛ ni nɛ wuki bɛntoŋ tɛ le dziŋ yɛ lu. Ɛ nɛ wuki lɛ, kiiŋ shéŋ ni yi soomi beŋ kɛ. Bini biɛɛ biee bi kɛmi le bi bɛ bi ka. Se nuuŋ le bi doonchi yɛ le ntsɛ wu li nshɛ yini-i maɔ kɛ.
Kwɛɛŋ gii wu ni wu tundi dziŋ bɛ wumu, mfɔŋ wumu tundi dziŋ bɛ wumu. Nshɛ gii yi ni yi nduŋgi li bintsii li, li bintsii li, dzeeŋ ni yi keeti. Bini biee mɛɛŋ biɛɛ fintɛŋ si ntunu wu kwɛɛŋ ti bɛɛchi.
Biee bini bichu biɛɛ si mfi wu kwɛɛŋ ti bɛchi ntunu.
Bɛniiŋ gii be nyɛ beŋ bɛ ni bɛ liti beŋ, bɛ ni bɛ woyi beŋ. Bitoŋ bichu ni bi baanini beŋ kii bukooŋ bweŋ.
Bɛdɛɛni bɛniiŋ ŋge ni be tusi bikaa lijiŋ, be kɛmi mbani, be kabini mɔɔ yi yibe.
Bɛniiŋ ŋge bɛ yɛŋgi le ɛ Nyɔ yi toŋ be gii be busɛ be ni be yɛŋgi bɛ bɛniiŋ ŋge.
Si bubefu gii bu yaŋ bu gɛɛŋ limfwe lɛ, fi gii fi fɛ se kiŋkɔŋgisɛ ki bɛniiŋ lɛ ŋgee to wɛɛ.
Se nuuŋ le, wi wu gii kaŋ shéŋ gɛɛŋ bo fɛ kimɛrisɛ gii bɔnɛ.
Bɛ kɛmi le be ni be tiifi ntoŋ wu dzeeŋ wuni kii bumfɔŋ bu Nyɔ-ɔ gɛɛŋ bo li kikoo ki nshɛ-ɛ kichu, bitoŋ bichu se woo, se ntsɛ wu li nshɛ-ɛ yini-i naa ma.
Bɛdɛɛni mfi wu nɛ ŋɛŋ fiee fi bɛndi yi fi nuuŋ fi biifi kintsii fi ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ wu Danyɛ tɛ tee kii fi, fi lemi li yih yi muntofi, (wi wu teenyi kiŋwaati kini woo fini bujɔŋ,)
bɛniiŋ bɛ nuuŋ Judiya kifi be miri li bɛŋkumɛ-ɛ.
Kiiŋ wi wu nuuŋ lɛ yi-ih lɛwe tuu shee le lɛ dzɔɔ fiee li yih kɛ.
Kiiŋ wi wu nuuŋ liwɛ tuu kaari lɛ gɛɛŋ dzɔɔ kiŋkoŋ ki fochɛ kɛ.
Ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wɛ li jo yɛɛ li bukɛɛŋ bɛ nuuŋ bɛ fe-e, mɔɔ bɛ kisi bɔɔŋ.
Nɛ lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ le kiiŋ wuni ŋgwɛti nuuŋ mfi wu fokpɔŋ, kɛ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi kɛ,
kifɛ ŋgɛ wu ŋge gii nuuŋ li wɛɛ mfi-i, ŋwaani wɛɛ ŋgɛ ti mɛɛŋɔ saa ki nuuŋ kɛ lu fɛ mbɛɛchɛ si nshɛ tɛ̀ bɛchi mbɛ mbochu dɛɛni kɛ, ŋwaani wɛɛ ŋgɛ mɛɛŋ yɛɛ naa nuuŋ lu kɛ.
Nyɔ tɛ̀ gii mɛɛŋ ki gatɛ kɛ li jo yilu kɛ, wi mumkpaŋ gii wu bochɛ-ɛ lu kɛ. Se nuuŋ le Nyɔ tɛ̀ gatɛ jo yilu kii bɛniiŋ bee bɛ tɛ̀ tsaa.
Gii ni nuuŋ li mfi wu wɛɛ, ɛ wi kweŋgi li be-eŋ le, ‘Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ kɛɛ kɛ fɛni!’ Dɛɛŋ le, ‘wɛ fɛ fiiyɛ!’ Kiiŋ nɛ ni beŋ kɛ.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le bɛniiŋ gii naa be ni be bɛɛ be yɛŋgi le be baa nuuŋ binsofu bi Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ, bamu ni be kweŋgi le ɛ be bɛntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ, be ni be feti biee bi tɛɛmi bi doonchi buŋga bubee, be fɛ tɛ bintɛ wa bi biee lɛ, le be yɛɛŋ bɛ bɛniiŋ se be taŋ dzé, be gii be gwenɛ le be yɛɛŋ mɔɔ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ Nyɔ tɛ̀ tsaa, ɛ dze bo lu.
Yikɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ woo, mi nteeɔ biee bini li be-eŋ se bi naa bi ka.
Bɛdɛɛni, ɛ bɛniiŋ dza be tiiti li be-eŋ le, ‘Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ kɛɛ libuka,’ kiiŋ nɛ ni gɛɛŋ lu kɛ. Kɛ le, ‘Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, wɛ li yih lɛnti kibɛɛ,’ kiiŋ nɛ ni beŋ li bee kɛ.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le si dzaaŋ ti lɛɛbi liwe lɛ kimbɛ ki jobɛ tɛti, yi yenɛ yi gɛɛŋ yi bo fɛ jobɛ sechi, ɛ lɛ si mbɛ wu Ŋwanɛwi gii naa nuuŋ.
‘Ɛ fɛ gwini chi fiee lɛ nuuŋ, ɛ nɛɛ fe fɛ biŋguru banchi.’
Mfwaa mumkpaŋ fɛ mfi wu ŋgɛ wu nyɔŋa wuni bɛ wu ka, jobɛ dza chi jiŋ, kwii tɛ nɛɛŋ kɛ, muntsɔŋ dza liboo mu weyɛ, biee bi liboo bichu bi kɛmi buŋga sɛɛsɛ.
Se ndoonchɛ wu Ŋwanɛwi yenɛ liboo. Bitoŋ bichu bi li nshɛ-ɛ bɛchi bi ni bi fuuti bɛ kwe. Bɛniiŋ gii be ŋɛŋ si Ŋwanɛwi bɛɛ li kiku-uŋ liboo bɛ buŋga mɔɔ bunɔŋa.
Fɛ sɔŋ yi nyɔŋa gii yi yɔ liboo, biee toŋ bɛnchindaa bee be gɛɛŋ li boo yi naa yi li nshɛ-ɛ, be yɛɛ mɔɔ liboo, be banchɛ bɛniiŋ bee bɛ tɛ̀ tsaa.
Laanchɛ yɛɛŋ fiee li kigumɛ-ɛ. Ki bɛɛ fɛ ki sanyɛ yɛŋɛ, bibɛ bɛchi mbɔchɛ li ki-i, nɛ kɛɛ le ndzɛɛŋ yɛ tsɛkɛ.
Nɛɛ lɛ ɛ nɛ ŋɛŋ biee bini bichu kɛti, nɛ kɛɛ le mfi wulu wɛ tsɛkɛtsɛkɛ mfweeŋ.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le kiŋgɔkɛ ki dɛɛni kini nuuŋ ki tɛ naa ma biee bini bichu mɛɛŋ ki ka kɛ.
Kiboo bee nshɛ gii bi ka, se nuuŋ le jɛ yɛŋ nuuŋ tɛ naa ka kɛ.
Wi nuuŋ yɛ mɔɔ lu wu kii jobɛ chilu, mɔɔ mfi wulu kɛ. Mɔɔ bɛnchindaa bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ bɛ liboo mɔɔ Ŋwanɛ Nyɔ kii yɛ tɛ kɛ. Ɛ Nyɔ Baa yi yi mbiiŋ kwaa yi kii.
Nɛɛ si fi tɛ nuuŋ li mfi wu Noa li lɛ, ɛ lɛ si fi gii fi nuuŋ li mfi wu Ŋwanɛwi gii kaari bɛ.
Tɛ̀ nuuŋ mfi wu dzɔɔ ti mɛɛŋ ki yisɛ kɛ li kikoo ki nshɛ kɛ, bɛniiŋ nuuŋ fibee, be jii biee, be wundi biee, bukɛɛŋ bɛ buniŋ feti bugoo, bɛniiŋ nyɛɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ bukɛɛŋ li bugoo li, gɛɛŋ bo jobɛ chi Noa tɛ̀ lɛ lɛ yih yi li dzɔɔ li,
bɛniiŋ bɛlu tɛ̀ kii yɛ fiee fi gii fi ka kɛ, gɛɛŋ bo mfi wu dzɔɔ tɛ̀ yisɛ li nshɛ-ɛ yi too be bɛchu yi gɛɛŋ bɛ be. Ɛ lɛ si fi gii fi nuuŋ jobɛ chi Ŋwanɛwi gii naa bɛ.
Buniŋ bɛfɛ gii be ni be nuuŋ liwɛ, bɛ dzɔɔ mumkpaŋ mumkpaŋ shɛ.
Bukɛɛŋ bɛfɛ gii be ni be geki bunɛɛŋ fɛ jeeŋ, bɛ dzɔɔ mumkpaŋ mumkpaŋ shɛ.
Bɛdɛɛni, nɛ tɛŋgi yɛɛŋ kifɛ nɛ kii yɛ jobɛ chi Taa wunɛ gii naa bɛ kɛ.
Nɛ kii le ɛ te yih kɛɛ mfi wu wih gii bɛ butuu, tɛ lee kɛ, ni kiichi, tɛ chinɛ le bɛ bondɛ yih ye kɛ.
Fi se nuuŋ le, nɛ kɛmi le nɛ ni nɛ tɛŋgi kifɛ Ŋwanɛwi gii bɛ li mfi wu nɛ kii yɛ kɛ-ɛ.
Ŋwanɛ nimɛ wu chɛɛŋ mɔɔ wu kɛmi bufii nuuŋ wu la? Ɛ nɛɛ wu te kikoo we gɛɛ wu le ni bichi fɛ yih ye le ke mfi kɔchɛ, nyɛ biee bijɛ li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ nimɛ-ɛ ni?
Kinɛɛtinɛ kinɔŋa gii ki nuuŋ ki ŋwanɛ nimɛ wu te kikoo we gii ke wu bɛ ŋɛŋ ɛ wu fɛ nimɛ tsaaŋ si bee gɛɛ.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le te kikoo we gii bɛ yɛɛki wu ni bichi lɛ biee biee bichu-u.
Se nuuŋ le ɛ ŋwaanɛ nimɛ wulu dza tuu kɛmi kiŋge ki bifi, wu tee li yi yee le, ‘Te Kikoo wɛŋ nuuŋ tɛ kaari tsɛkɛ kɛ’,
ɛ wu bɛchi tuki bɔɔŋ bɛ nimɛ-ɛ bamu bɛ bee be nindi baa, jii biee tuu wundi biee bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ wundi mbiiŋ,
kɛ te kikoo we gii dza taa mbundɛ jobɛ chimu chi beechi yɛ mɔɔ mfi wu kii yɛ kɛ.
Ɛ wu mbundɛ lɛ, nyɛ ŋgɛ li ŋwani wu nimɛ wulu-u, tuumi wu gɛɛŋ ni nuuŋ li kintutu ki bɛniiŋ bɛ nimi-i, ni nuuŋ fɛ bɛniiŋ gii be ni be dii be jii ŋgesi.”
“Bɛ nuuŋ bɛ maa bumfɔŋ bu liboo bɛ bɛsɔɔŋ bɛ bukɛɛŋ lɛ bamu yoofi bɛ tɛ̀ dzɔ bɛlambo bɛ bee, le be gɛɛŋ be taaŋ nyuŋ wutso be chinɛ wu.
Bɛtiinu tɛ̀ nuuŋ bibere, bɛtiinu nuuŋ bɛ bufii lɛ.
Fi se ka le bɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bibere baa tɛ̀ dzɔ bɛlambo bɛ bee ndzɔtsu mɛɛŋ mamu siŋ,
bɛ bufii lɛ baa se dzɔ bɛlambo bɛ bee mɔɔ sho yi mɛɛŋ mamu lu lichiŋ.
Le be gɛɛŋ be ni be tɛŋgi nyuŋ wutso wulu, le ni chiiti yi li mbɛɛ, chilefɛ dza chi kɔɔ be, be bɛchi nlefu.
Le bo butuu kintikinti, be dza be woo si wi wuuyi le, ‘Yiyi-i yiyi-i yiyi-i, bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, nyuŋ wutso wulu fɛsɔɔ looo! Bo yɛɛŋ nɛ bɛ nɛ fi wu looo’
Bɛsɔɔŋ bɛ bukɛɛŋ lɛ baa bɛchu dza we be yɛɛki bɛlambo bɛ bee.
Bɛsɔɔŋ bɛ bukɛɛŋ lɛ bɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bibere baa se tee li bɛ bufii lɛ baa le, ‘Nyɛ yɛɛŋ bee fɛ mɛɛŋ mɛnɛ. Bɛlambo bɛsɛŋ shiiti baa.’
Bɛ bufii lɛ baa se tuu le, ‘Wohoo, me nuuŋ tɛ kɔchɛ li tɛɛbeŋ bɛchu kɛ. Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ nuuŋ fɛ bɛ kabini, nɛ go mɛnɛ.’
Si be tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ le be go lɛ, nyuŋ wutso wulu shɛ fɛsi. Bɛ tɛ̀ nachɛ yi kituŋ be tɛŋgi baa, biee be gɛɛŋ be lɛ bɛ wu li yih yi tsɔnɔ chi bugoo lɛ, bɛ bɛŋɛ kigoo.
Lɛjiŋ lɛlu, bɛsɔɔŋ bɛ bukɛɛŋ lɛ bamu bɛ tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ le be go mɛɛŋ baa fɛsi, be leŋ mfweeŋ be tiiti le, ‘Te Kikoo, te kikoo, gwiyɛ kigoo tɛ lɛ.’
Se tuu li bee le, ‘Chɛɛŋ chɛɛŋ ŋkii yɛ beŋ kɛ.’
Fi se fiɛɛ le, nɛ nachɛ yi, nɛ ni nɛ tɛŋgi, kifɛ nɛ kii yɛ jobɛ mɔɔ mfi wulu kɛ.
Mfi wulu gii ni nuuŋ si wumu wu tɛ̀ wɛki le gɛɛŋ ndɛndɛ, teeŋ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ nimɛ nyɛ kwa we li tsáŋ yi bee.
Tɛ̀ nyɛ ŋwani wu nimɛ wumu bɛbabi bɛ kwaa bɛtiinu, nyɛ wumu bɛbabi bɛfɛ, nyɛ wumu babi wu kwa mumkpaŋ. Tɛ̀ nyɛɛ lɛ biki si buŋga bu wi nuuŋ. Si tɛ̀ nyɛ lɛ, la ndɛndɛ we.
Ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu tɛ̀ fi bɛbabi bɛ kwaa bɛtiinu wɛ, tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ mfwaa mumkpaŋ fɛ waŋ lu, ji mbeŋ le bɛbabi bɛtiinu.
Wu tɛ̀ fi bɛbabi bɛfɛ wɛ, tɛ̀ fɛ waŋ lu, ji mbeŋ bɛbabi bɛfɛ le lɛwe.
Se nuuŋ le, ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu tɛ̀ fi babi wu kwa mumkpaŋ wɛ, tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ fiee chiŋ kitoo nyikɛ kwa wu te kikoo wɛɛ le lɛnti.
Si te kikoo wu bɔɔŋ bɛ nimɛ wulu tɛ̀ la ndɛndɛ wɛ lɛ, tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ tsiiŋ le ŋge. Le kaari bɛ, teeŋ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ nimɛ, le be bɛ, be bee nachɛ biee.
Ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu tɛ̀ fi bɛbabi bɛ kwaa bɛtiinu wɛ bɛ kituŋ bɛ bɛbabi yoofi, tee le, ‘Te Kikoo, ɔ tuu ɔ nyɛ mi bɛbabi bɛ kwaa bɛtiinu, bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ ntuu nshɛ mi mfɛ waŋ lu, mi ŋkɛmɛ bɛbabi bamu bitiinu le lɛwe.’
Te Kikoo we tee li wuu le, ‘Kiyɔɔni kinɔŋa. Ɛ wɛ ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu dzeeŋ mɔɔ wu chɛɛŋ! Ɔ tuu ɔ shɛ ɔ nuuŋ tsaaŋ lɛ mbichɛ lɛ fiee fi ntɛŋ bujɔŋ. Bɛdɛɛni, ŋgii ŋgɛɛ wɛ dɛɛni ɔ ni ɔ bichi tɛ lɛ fi nɔŋa-a. Bɛ ɔ woo bujɔŋ bɛ te kikoo wa.’
Ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu kwa we tɛ̀ nuuŋ bɛbabi bɛfɛ wɛ tɛ lɛ, tee le, ‘Te Kikoo, ɔ tɛ̀ nyɛ mi bɛbabi bɛ kwaa bɛfɛ. Bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ, ntuu nshɛ mi fɛ waŋ lu, mi ŋkɛmɛ bɛbabi bamu bɛ kwa bɛfɛ le lɛwe.’
Te Kikoo we tee li wuu le, ‘Kiyɔɔni kinɔŋa. Ɛ wɛ ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu dzeeŋ mɔɔ wu chɛɛŋ! Ɔ tuu ɔ shɛ ɔ nuuŋ tsaaŋ lɛ mbichɛ lɛ fiee fintɛ-ɛŋ bujɔŋ. Bɛdɛɛni, ŋgii ŋgɛɛ wɛ dɛɛni ɔ ni ɔ bichi tɛ lɛ fi nɔŋa-a. Bɛ ɔ woo bujɔŋ bɛ te kikoo wa.’
Le ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wumu wu tɛ̀ nyɛ babi wu kwa mumkpaŋ wɛ bɛ lɛ, tee le, ‘Te Kikoo, ŋkii le ɔ nuuŋ wi wu tɛɛmi lɛ dzaa. Ɔ ti wechi fɛ ɔ mɛɛŋ ki tɔyɛ kɛ, ɔ se banchi giiŋ yɔɔ ti mɛɛŋ ki tuŋ kɛ.
Bɛdɛɛni ntɛ̀ chɛndi ŋgɛɛŋ nyikɛ kwa wa fɛtoo. Bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ, wuuŋ kwa wa, kɔ.’
Te Kikoo we tuu li wuu le, ‘Ɛ wɛ ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ wu bifi, ɔ wɛ kiniŋgɛ! Ɔ ti kii le nti ŋ'wechi mɛɛŋ ki ntɔyɛ kɛ, mbaanchi giiŋ mɛɛŋ ki tuŋ kɛ.
Si ɔ tuuɔ kii lɛ, tuu nuuŋ ɔ kiri kwa wɛŋ li yih yi bɛ kichi kwa lu, le ke mfi wu mi ŋkaari mfi kwa wɛŋ bɛ mbeŋ le lɛwe.’
Si tɛ̀ tee lɛ, tee le be fi babi wu kwa wulu li wuu, be nyɛ li wi wu kɛmi bɛbabi bɛ kwa yoofi wɛ-ɛ.
Le be kɛɛ le wi wu kɛmi, bɛ gii bɛ naa bɛ tondɛ wu kɛmɛ ŋge. Se nuuŋ le wi wu kɛmi yɛ kɛ, mɔɔ nuuŋ fi niiŋ fi kɛmi bɛ gii bɛ fi li wuu.
Si tɛ̀ tee lɛ, tee le, ‘Lɔmɛ yɛɛŋ kibere ki ŋwaŋ wu nimɛ-ɛ kini li kijibɛ lɛkuuŋ, fɛ gii ni dii jii ŋgesi.’
Gii ni nuuŋ mfi wu Ŋwanɛwi kaarisi bɛɛ li bunɔŋa bwee li, ni bɛɛ bɛ bɛnchindaa bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ bɛchu, gii shee li kabara we wu bunɔŋa.
Bitoŋ bichu bi li kikoo ki nshɛ gii bi leŋ wu limfwe, se gatɛ be li bintutu bifɛ si wi wu ŋkiichɛ ti gatini nshɔ́ɔŋ buu li bí linti lɛ.
Gii gɛɛ nshɔ́ɔŋ lɛ kibɛnɛ ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ, se gɛɛ bí lɛ kibɛnɛ ki kimɛsɛ-ɛ.
Wu wu Mfɔŋ gii tee li bɛ nuuŋ lɛ kibɛnɛ kee ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ le, ‘Bɛniiŋ bɛ Taa tiiŋ mwɛ li bee, bɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ kɛmɛ bintsii lɛ bumfɔŋ bu bɛ nachɛ li be-eŋ mbɛɛchɛ si bɛ tɛ̀ tɔŋ nshɛ,
kifɛ dzeeŋ tɛ̀ wuu mi, nɛ nyɛ mi biee bijɛ. Ndɔɔŋ tɛ̀ wondɛ mi, nɛ nyɛ mi fiee ŋ'woŋ. Ntɛ̀ nuuŋ kilɔ, nɛ fi mi.
Ntɛ̀ nuuŋ bwiŋ kilɛrɛ, nɛ lii mi ndu. Ntɛ̀ ŋgendi nɛ bɛ nɛ yɛsi mi. Ntɛ̀ nuuŋ li yih yi ncha-a, nɛ bɛ nɛ yɛsi mi.’
Gii ke wu tee lɛ, bɛniiŋ bɛ tsaaŋ baa se tuu be bii li wuu laa, ‘Taa, ɛ mfi wu la wu tɛ tɛ̀ ŋɛŋ wɛ dzeeŋ wuu wɛ, tɛ̀ nyɛ wɛ biee bijɛ, bɛ mfi wu la wu ndɔɔŋ tɛ̀ wondɛ wɛ tɛ nyɛ wɛ fiee ɔ woŋ?
Ɛ mfi wu la wu tɛ tɛ̀ ŋɛŋ wɛ ɔ nuuŋ kilɔ, tɛ fi wɛ, bɛ mfi wu la wɔɔ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bwiŋ kilɛrɛ, tɛ lii wɛ ndu?
Ɛ mfi wu la wu tɛ tɛ ŋɛŋ wɛ ɔ gendi ɔ nuuŋ tɛ li yih yi ncha-a, tɛ se bɛ tɛ yɛsi wɛ?’
Mfɔŋ se tuu li bee le, ‘Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, si nɛ tɛ̀ feti biee bini, li wi wu ŋkwɛŋ li bɛŋwaanɛŋ bani-i, nɛ tɛ̀ feti nuuŋ li mi-i.’
Bɛdɛɛni, gii tuu tee li bɛ nuuŋ lɛ kibɛnɛ kee ki kimɛsɛ baa le, ‘Beŋ bɛ kinlɔɔ lɛ bani, dza yɛɛŋ mi limfwe, nɛ gɛɛŋ nɛ lɛ li ŋgɛ wu kimakɛ-ɛ wu bɛ tɛ̀ nachɛ li kiŋkundi bɛ bɛnchindaa bee li,
kifɛ dzeeŋ tɛ̀ wuu mi, nɛ ti mɛɛŋ ki nyɛ kɛ mi fiee fijɛ kɛ. Ndɔɔŋ tɛ̀ wondɛ mi, nɛ faaŋ nyɛ mi fiee fi ŋ'wonɛ.
Ntɛ̀ nuuŋ kilɔ, nɛ tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki fii mi kɛ. Ntɛ̀ nuuŋ bwiŋ kilɛrɛ, nɛ tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki lii kɛ mi ndu li bwiŋ kɛ. Ntɛ̀ ŋgendi, ntuu nuuŋ li yih yi ncha-a, nɛ ti mɛɛŋ ki bɛ kɛ le nɛ yɛsi mi kɛ.’
Be se tuu be bii li wuu laa, ‘Taa, ɛ mfi wu la wu tɛ tɛ̀ ŋɛŋ wɛ dzeeŋ wuu wɛ, kɛ ndɔɔŋ wondini wɛ, ɔ nuuŋ kilɔ, kɛ bwiŋ kilɛrɛ, ɔ gendi, bɛ li yih yi ncha-a, tɛ se mɛɛŋ ki fi kɛ wɛ kɛ?’
Se tuu li bee le, ‘Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, si nɛ ti mɛɛŋ ki fɛ kɛ biee bini li wi wu ŋkwɛ-ɛŋ li bɛŋwaanɛŋ bani ni kɛ, kɛ ɛ li mi li nɛ ti mɛɛŋ ki fɛɛ kɛ.’
Beeyɛ bɛniiŋ gii be gɛɛŋ be lɛ li ŋgɛ wu kimakɛ-ɛ. Se bɛ nuuŋ tsaaŋ baa gɛɛŋ be lɛ fibee nuuŋ li ntsɛ wu shaaŋ wu nuuŋ tɛ ma kɛ.”
Le Jiso yɔ biee bini bichu mɛɛshi, tee li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u le,
“Nɛ kɛɛ le shɛɔ jo faa, ni nuuŋ Tsɔnɔ chi N'yafuwee, bɛ gii bɛ nyɛ Ŋwanɛwi li tsaŋ yi bɛniiŋ li be ta wu li kintaaŋ li.”
Nɛɛ li mfi wulu, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ se gɛɛŋ be lɛ ntsuuŋ lɛ ntɔ wu Kaifas wu tɛ̀ nuuŋ kikoo ki bɛte muntofi,
be biee be dzɔ ntaŋ si be gii be wɛɛŋ be se kɔɔ Jiso, be wo.
Si be tɛ̀ dzɔ ntaŋ lɛ, be tee le, “Kiiŋ tɛ ni mɔŋ fiee fini li mfi wu Tsɔnɔ-ɔ kɛ, kifɛ ɛ tɛ mɔŋ, fi bɛ bɛ kweŋɛ lɛ bɛniiŋ li lɛnti.”
Le Jiso tuu ni nuuŋ lɛ kitoŋ ki Bɛtani-i, li Simu wu wi wu chigɔŋ chi nɔŋa yih,
be shee be jii biee, kwɛɛŋ wumu dza lɛ lu kɛmi mɛɛŋ mamu mɛ sɛɛndi lɛ fika fimu fi bɛ nachɛ bɛ tɛtɛ, me tɛɛmi kwa ŋge, tumi li kikoo ki Jiso-o.
Le bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso-o bɛ kintutu-u ŋɛŋ lɛ, fiee filu tɔŋ be shéŋ ŋge. Be tee le, “Bifisi mɛɛŋ mɛlu kii la?
Bee nuuŋ bɛ kabɛ mɛɛŋ mɛlu li kwa ŋgee, bɛ nyɛ kwa wulu li bɛniiŋ bɛ kifoo lɛ.”
Se nuuŋ le, Jiso tɛ̀ kɛɛ mbeechɛ wube, tee li bee le, “Nɛ nyɛɛ ŋgɛ li kwɛɛŋ wuni kii la? Wu fɛɔ nuuŋ fiee fi dzeeŋ li mi-i.
Nɛ ni nɛ kii le bɛniiŋ bɛ kifoo lɛ gii be ni be nuuŋ bɛ beŋ mfi kwi, se nuuŋ le, nuuŋ tɛ nuuŋ tɛɛbeŋ mfi kwi kɛ.
Wu shooshɔɔ mɛɛŋ mani li yi yɛɛŋ ni le nachɛ nuuŋ si bɛ gii bɛ diyɛ mi.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le mɔɔ nuuŋ fɛŋ fɛ bɛ gii bɛ ni bɛ tiifi ntoŋ wu dzeeŋ wuni li kikoo ki nshɛ kichu, bɛ gii bɛ ni bɛ tiiti kii fiee fi kwɛɛŋ wuni fɛ bɛ se ni bɛ kiimi wu.”
Wi wumu li kintutu ki bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ baa wu bɛ tɛ̀ teenyi le Judas Iskaliyɔ dza gɛɛŋ ŋɛŋ bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa,
bii li bee laa, “Ɛ mi nyɛ Jiso li tsaŋ yinɛ-ɛ, nɛ nyɛ mi la?” Be biee be fa bɛ siri mbaanshɛɛ be nyɛ li wuu.
Mbɛɛchɛ li mfi wɛ, bɛchi wɛki dze yi gii nyɛ Jiso li tsáŋ yi bee.
Le ni nuuŋ jobɛ chi ŋkosi chi Tsɔnɔ chi Kibele ki bɛ mɛɛŋ ki gɛɛ kɛ kishee le kɛ, bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu-u bɛ Jiso bɛ fɛ wuu, be bii li wuu laa, “Ɔ wɛki le tɛ gɛɛŋ tɛ nachɛ fɛ ɔ gii ɔ ji Tsɔnɔ chi N'yafuwee chilu nuuŋ fɛŋ?”
Tuu li bee le, “Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ fɛ la nyɔŋa ɛ nɛ ŋɛŋ wi, nɛ tee li mwɛ le, ‘Wi wu Ntiifɛ teeɔ le mfi we kɔchɔɔ. Gii ji Tsɔnɔ chi N'yafuwee bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u li wɛɛ yih.’”
Bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu-u bɛlu gɛɛŋ be fɛ nɛɛ si Jiso bee tee li bee, be biee be nachɛ biee bijɛ bi Tsɔnɔ chi N'yafuwee chilu lu.
Le ni nuuŋ lɛ fɛmfo-o, shee bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu bɛ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ baa le be ji biee.
Le be ni be jii, dza tee li be le, “Ntee li be-eŋ chɛɛŋ le, wi wumu li be-eŋ linti gii kabɛ mi.”
Si bee tee lɛ, bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u dza be to nshiiŋ nshiiŋ, be bɛchi be biiti li wuu mumkpaŋ mumkpaŋ laa, “Nuuŋ bo mi ni Taa?”
Tuu li bee le, “Wi wu gii kabɛ mi ɛ wi wu tɛɛ wu gii tɛ bikɛ kibɛnɛ lɛ sho-o.
Ŋwanɛwi gii gɛɛŋ nɛɛ fiee si bɛ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ kii wu. Se nuuŋ le, kinlɔɔ kinɔŋa kɛɛ li wi wu kabɛ Ŋwanɛwi-i. Fi tɛ̀ dzɔɔŋ ŋge le gii bɛ ba wu ki biɛ kɛ.”
Judas wu tɛ̀ nuuŋ le gii kabɛ Jiso bii tɛ li wuu laa, “Nuuŋ bo mi ni, Wi wu Ntiifɛ?” Jiso tee li wuu le, “Ɔ teeɔ bɛ kimfimɛ ko.”
Si be tɛ̀ jii biee lɛ, Jiso dza dzɔ kibele, nyɛ kiyɔɔni li Nyɔ-ɔ, booyɛ nyɛ li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u tee le, “Kɔ yɛɛŋ nɛ ji, yini nuuŋ yi yɛŋ.”
Tuu dzɔ tɛ fika, nyɛ kiyɔɔni li Nyɔ-ɔ nyɛ fika filu li bee tee le, “Wonɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ tasɛ beŋ bɛchu.
Mani nuuŋ ŋgɔŋ meŋ mɛ Nyɔ ji leh lu mɛ bo kii bɛniiŋ ŋgee, le se feeki bibifi bi bee.
Ntee beŋ le mɛɛŋ yɛ ntuu ŋ'woŋ mbiiŋ mɛ fiŋgeetɛ fi lɛɛndi mani mbɛɛchɛ dɛɛni, nsiiŋ gɛɛŋ bo jobɛ chi ŋgii naa ŋ'woŋ mɛ fɛŋ tɛɛbeŋ lɛnti lɛ bumfɔŋ bu Baa wɛŋ kɛ.”
Le Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u mɛɛshi, be yoo jumi chi n'yɔɔnchɛ, be dza be michi be giiŋgi li ŋkumɛ wu Biti bi Oli-if.
Si Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u tɛ̀ giiŋgi lɛ, dza tee li bee le, “Butuu bu bɛŋ buni beŋ bɛchu gii nɛ chee bikaa lijiŋ kii fiee fi gii fi ka bɛ mi. Fi fiɛɛ si bɛ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ Nyɔ tiiti le, ‘Ŋgii ŋ'wo kiŋkiichɛ nshɔ́ɔŋ kintutu ki nshɔɔŋ lɛ se saaŋgɛ.’
Se nuuŋ le, mfi wu Nyɔ buu mi li kwe-e, ntoo mbaŋ li be-eŋ Galilii.”
Se Pita biee tee fiee li wuu le, “Ɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu chee bikaa lijiŋ kii fiee fi gii fi ka bɛ wɛ, ɛ bɛ nyɛ ntɛ chee bikaa lijiŋ tɛ kɛ.”
Jiso tee li wuu le, “Ntee wɛ chɛɛŋ le butuu bu bɛŋ buni, nyinɛshee gii ke yi teŋgɔɔ, nuuŋ ɔɔ faaŋ mi kiŋga kitɛɛtɛ.”
Pita tee li wuu le, “Mɔɔ nuuŋ le ŋgii ŋkwi tɛɛ wɛ, nuuŋ bɛ tɛ faaŋ wɛ kɛ.” Si tɛ̀ tee nɛɛ lɛ, bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu-u bɛ Jiso bamu baa bɛchu tee nɛɛ tɛ lɛ.
Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u gɛɛŋ be lɛ li wɛ wu biti bi muntaaŋ lɛ wumu, wu bɛ teenyi le Gɛsɛmani, tee li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu baa le, “Shee yɛɛŋ fɛni ŋ'waaki yi fɛŋgooŋ fɛmu nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ”
Dzɔ Pita bee bɔɔŋ bɛ Dzɛbɛdii bɛ bɛfɛ baa, bee be gɛɛŋ. Se bɛchi nuuŋ nshiiŋ nshiiŋ, shéŋ yee kɛɛti.
Biee tee li bee le, “Shéŋ yɛŋ yɛɛ nshiiŋ nshiiŋ ŋge nuuŋ kɛɛ ŋkwiiɔ. Shɛ yɛɛŋ fɛni nɛ ni nɛ tɛŋgi.”
Jiso dza fe kiiŋgi gɛɛŋ limfwe niiŋ, we chiŋ bushi fɛkwiiŋ, lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ le, “Baa wɛŋ, ɛ dze nuuŋ lu yi nuuŋ nɛɛ ɔ fɛ le fika fi ŋgɛ-ɛ fini ka mi ŋ'wonu siŋ, ɔ fɛ. Se nuuŋ le, kiiŋ ɔ ni fɛ si ŋkɔŋgisi kɛ, fɛrɛ nuuŋ si ɔ kɔŋgisi.”
Dza kaari to lijiŋ fɛ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu, ŋɛŋ si be liiti. Bii li Pita laa, “Fi nuuŋ le ɛ bɛ nyɛ nɛ tɛ shee we bɛ mi le bo si mfi ntaŋ mumkpaŋ kɛ ni?
Nɛ nuuŋ yɛɛŋ we, nɛ lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ kii nɛ ni lɛ li mɔnchɛ. Fi nuuŋ chɛɛŋ le shéŋ kɔŋgisi lɔ, se nuuŋ le nyaŋ yi bwiŋ nuuŋ fɛɛ.”
Tuu kaari gɛɛŋ kiŋga kifɛ lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ le, “Baa wɛŋ, ɛ fi nuuŋ le ɛ bɛ nyɛ fika fini tɛ ka fuki fɛ mi ŋ'woŋ siŋ ɔ fɛ nɛɛ si ɔ kɔŋgisi.”
Le tuu kaari to lijiŋ ka ŋɛŋ si bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u liiti kifɛ chilefɛ tɛ nuuŋ be lɛ lii ŋge.
Tuu ka shɛ be, kaari gɛɛŋ tuu lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ kiŋga kitɛɛtɛ, lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ tiiti nɛɛ nuuŋ fiee fi bee saa tiiti fiɛɛ.
Tuu kaari to lijiŋ fɛ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu tee li bee le, “Nɛ mɛɛŋ baa nɛ liiti nɛ fufini finɛ ni? Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ, mfi kɔchɔɔ kituŋ. Bɛ kabɛ baa Ŋwanɛwi li bɛniiŋ bɛ bifi-i.
Dza yɛɛŋ we tɛɛbeŋ tɛ ni tɛ giiŋgi. Bichɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ wi wu kabɛ mi bɛɛɔ kituŋ.”
Nɛɛ si Jiso tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ yeti lɛ, Judas wu tɛ̀ nuuŋ wi kintutu ki bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ baa biee busɛ. Tɛ̀ gii bɛɛ bee kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ kinɔŋa, be kɛmi nyɔ bɛ bimboki, ɛ bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ bɛ tɛ̀ toŋ be.
Wi wu tɛ̀ kabɛ Jiso tɛ̀ nachɛ si gii doonchɛ li bɛniiŋ bɛlu, tee le, “Wi wu mi n'yɛsi wu, mi ŋkokɛ, kɛ ɛ wu, nɛ biee nɛ kɔɔ wu.”
Si bee be tɛ̀ bɛɛ lɛ, biee gɛɛŋ fɛ Jiso mfwaa mumkpaŋ tee li wu le, “Mi n'yɛsɔɔ wɛ Wi wu Ntiifɛ.” Si wu tee lɛ, biee kokɛ wu.
Jiso tee li wu le, “Sinɛŋ, fɛrɛ fiee fi ɔ bɛ le ɔ fɛ.” Bɛniiŋ baa biee be gɛɛŋ fɛ Jiso-o be cha wu.
Fi se ka le wumu wu tɛ̀ nuuŋ bɛ Jiso ɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bɛ nyɔ ye yi dziŋ lɛ mbwa-a buu, kɛri kintooŋ ki mfwa wu kikoo ki bɛte muntofi lu, sondɛ.
Jiso tee li wi wulu le, “Kaari tuu nyɔ ya lɛ mbwa li. Ɔ kɛɛ le wi kwi wu tsakisi nyɔ li we, gii naa kwi bɛ nyɔ.
Ɔ beechi le nuuŋ nlee ki nlaŋɛ kɛ le Taa tuumi bɛnchindaa bee fɛni mfwaa mumkpaŋ li bɛnchuki le be gwe kii mi kɛ ni?
Se nuuŋ le, ɛ mi dza mi fɛ lɛ, fi dɛndɛ niŋ fi se bɛ fi kɔchɛ si bɛ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ lɛ Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ le fi kɛmi le fi nuuŋ?”
Li mfi wɛɛ, Jiso tuu bii li kintutu kɛɛ laa, “Nɛ bɛɛ le nɛ kɔɔ mi nɛ bɛɛ bɛ nyɔ mɔɔ bimboki kɛ nɛɛ bɛɛ le nɛ kɔɔ nuuŋ wi wu bɛɛ bɛ kpɛ li kwɛɛŋ li ni? Ntuu nshiiŋ jo chi nshiiti li yih yi muntofi ntiifi bɛniiŋ lu nɛ tɛ kɔɔ mi kɛ kii la?
Se nuuŋ le, fiee fini fichu kɛti fiɛɛ nɛɛ le fi bɛ fi kɔchɛ si bɛntomfɔŋ bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ lɛ Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ.” Bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ kintutu-u bɛchu biee be shɛ wu fɛ, be kifi.
Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kɔɔ Jiso dzɔ wu be gɛɛŋ bɛ wu fɛ Kaifas wu te kikoo ki bɛte muntofi-i. Bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ banchɛ tɛ fe.
Be tɛ̀ giiŋgi bɛ Jiso Pita biki lɛjiŋ mfiiŋ. Le gɛɛŋ bo fɛ la wu kikoo ki bɛte muntofi-i, tuu lɛ gɛɛŋ shee bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kiichi la wulu le ŋɛŋ si fi gii fi ka.
Bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ sɛki bɛnsa tɛ̀ wɛki fiee fi be gii be sɛɛyɛ be terɛ Jiso le bɛ se wo wu.
Se nuuŋ le, be ti mɛɛŋ ki kɛmɛ kɛ fiee kɛ, bɛniiŋ ŋge buti be bɛɛ limfwe be sɛɛyi binsɛɛ. Si fi tɛ̀ kɛti lɛ bɛniiŋ bamu bɛfɛ bo be leŋ limfwe,
be tee le, “Bwɛɛ wuni tɛ̀ tiiti le nuuŋ shaanshɛ yih yi muntofi yi Nyɔ kaari gwaŋ li jo taa li.”
Kikoo ki bɛte muntofi kɛɛ dza we ki bii li Jiso laa, “Ɔ kɛmi yɛ fiee fi tusɛ kɛ ni? Ɔ wuki nɛɛ biee bi bɛniiŋ bani tiiti kii wɛ ni?”
Jiso ba nɛɛ nshiiŋ. Kikoo ki bɛte muntofi kɛɛ tuu ki tee li wuu le, “Tee chɛɛŋ li bukooŋ bu Nyɔ yi kɛmi ntsɛ, ɔɔ nuuŋ kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ ki Ŋwanɛ Nyɔ, ɔ tee bee.”
Jiso tuu li wuu le, “Fi fiɛɛ sɔɔ tee lɛ. Se nuuŋ le, ntee beŋ le, lɛjiŋ lɛ mfi wuni-i, nɛ gii nɛ ŋɛŋ Ŋwanɛwi, ɛ wu shee lɛ kibɛnɛ ki kigɔŋɛ ki Wi wu kɛmi Buŋga-a, nɛ tuu nɛ ŋɛŋ si bɛɛ li kiku-uŋ liboo.”
Kikoo ki bɛte muntofi kɛɛ woo lɛ, ki tuu ki gaamɛ ndú yi ki, ki tee le, “Wu dzɔɔ kintsii ki Nyɔ-ɔ. Fiee nuuŋ yɛ lu fi tɛɛbeŋ tuu geendi le wi leŋ fɛni ni tiiti kɛ? Nɛ woo baa kituŋ si wu dzɔ kintsii ki Nyɔ-ɔ.
Nɛ se sondɛ le la?” Be tuu le, “Ɛ wi wu bɛ nuuŋ bɛ wo.”
Be se bɛchi be kwiyi budii li bushi bu Jiso-o, be juti wu bɛ muŋkɔ, be suŋgi bɛ tsaŋ be tiiti li wuu le,
“Wɛ wu nuuŋ Krai, fɛrɛ kintomfɔŋ ko ki Nyɔ dɛɛni li bee li. Tee wi wu sooŋ wɛ.”
Tɛ̀ nuuŋ ɛ Pita shee lɛkuuŋ la kintikinti. Ŋwaŋ wu kwɛɛŋ wumu wu tɛ̀ nindi fe, dza bɛ li wuu lichiŋ tee li wuu le, “Ɔ bee tɛ nɛɛ Jiso wu Galilii wulu.”
Se nuuŋ le, Pita faaŋ limfwe li bɛniiŋ bɛchu tee le, “Ŋkii yɛ fiee fi ɔ tiiti kɛ.”
Pita tuu dza bo gɛɛŋ fɛ fweeŋ wu ntɔ-ɔ. Se ŋwaakwɛɛŋ wumu wu tɛ̀ nindi tɛ fe, ŋɛŋ wu, tuu tee li bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ nindi fe baa le, “Wi wuni bee nuuŋ bee Jiso wu Nasarɛ wulu.”
Pita tuu faaŋ, chini, tee le, “Ŋkii yɛ wi wulu kɛ.”
Le mfi tuu kiiŋgi niiŋ, bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ lemi fe kiiŋgi be gɛɛŋ li Pita lichiŋ be tee li wuu le, “Li chɛɛŋ li, ɔ nuuŋ tɛ wi wu be wumu, kifɛ n'yɔru wa wɛ si wube.”
Pita tuu faaŋ, teeŋ kinlɔɔ li yi yee li tee le, “Ŋkii yɛ wi wuni kɛ.” Mfwaa mumkpaŋ nyinɛshee biee yi tɔɔŋ.
Pita kimi n'yɔru wu Jiso bee yɔ li wu le, “Nyinɛshee gii ke yi tɔɔŋ, ɔɔ faaŋ mi kiŋga kitɛɛtɛ.” Se dza fe bo lɛkuuŋ, keeri kwe ŋge.
Le butuu ni bu wuuti, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ, shee be dzɔ ntaŋ kii Jiso le be wo wu.
Be se kaŋ wu, be dzɔ wu be gɛɛŋ be nyɛ li tsaŋ yi Pailɛ-ɛt wu tɛ̀ nuuŋ ŋgɔmina lɛ kimbɛ kilu.
Le Judas wu tɛ̀ kabɛ Jiso ŋɛŋ le bɛ sondɛ baa le bɛ gii bɛ wo wu, kaari shéŋ yee, dzɔ bɛ siri bɛ mbaanshɛɛ baa kaari gɛɛŋ le tuu li bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ baa.
Le gɛɛŋ lɛ, tee li bee le, “Mi mfɛɔ bubiɛɛ le ŋkabɛ wi wu mɛɛŋ ki chɔ kɛ fiee kɛ wuni.” Be se tuu li wu laa, “Fiɛɛ fiee kɛmi la fi fɛrɛ bɛ be le? Ɛ wɛ wu kiiɔ fiɛɛ fiee.”
Judas se bwaaki kwa wulu fɛkwiiŋ li yih yi muntofi-i, bo gɛɛŋ shiŋ.
Bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa kwachɛ kwa wulu be tee le, “Wuni wɛɛ kwa wu ŋgɔŋ, nchi mɛɛŋɔ ki beŋ kɛ le nuuŋ tɛ gɛɛ wu lɛ ŋko wu kwa wu li yih yi muntofi-i kɛ.”
Be shee be dzɔ ntaŋ, be gɛɛŋ be go kintsii li wumu wu tɛ mɛɛ mubee li, le be ni be diiyi mfoŋ fe.
Fiɛɛ fiee fi bɛ teenyi kintsii kilu mbɛ mbochu bɛŋ le, “Kintsii ki ŋgɔ-ɔŋ.”
Fi tɛ̀ ka lɛ le fiee fi ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ wu Jeremaya tɛ̀ tee bɛ fi kɔchɛ si tɛ̀ tiiti le, “Be tɛ̀ dzɔ kwa bɛ siri mbaanshɛɛ nuuŋ kwa wee wu bɔɔŋ bɛ Isɛlɛɛ tɛ̀ seesɛ li yi yee li,
be go kintsii li wi wu mɛɛ mubee li, nɛɛ si Taa Nyɔ tɛ̀ tee li mi-i.”
Si Jiso tɛ̀ leŋ limfwe li Pailɛ-ɛt wu ŋgɔmina wu Lo-om lɛ, Pailɛt bii li wu laa “Ɛ wɛ Mfɔŋ wu Bɛjuu ni?” Jiso tuu le, “Fi fiɛɛ si ɔ tee lɛ.”
Se bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ bɛchi be kayɛ biee li wuu, se tɛ mɔɔ tuu kɛ.
Pailɛt tuu bii li wu laa, “Ɔ wuki nɛɛ ŋwaani biee bi bɛ kayi li wɛ-ɛ bini ni?”
Se nuuŋ le, Jiso ti mɛɛŋ fiee li wuu ki tuu kɛ mɔɔ nuuŋ fimumkpaŋ li biee bi be tɛ̀ sɛɛyɛ li yee li biɛɛ kɛ. Le ŋgɔmina wulu ŋɛŋ lɛ wa tɛ wu.
Bɛdɛɛni tɛ̀ nuuŋ li mfi wu Tsɔnɔ chi N'yafuwee, ŋgɔmina wuni tɛ̀ shiiŋ busi wi mumkpaŋ wu bɛniiŋ wɛki li yih yi ncha-a.
Le ni nuuŋ li mfi wulu-u, wumu tɛ̀ nuuŋ li yih yi ncha, ɛ be tɛ̀ kii wu kii kiŋge kee ki bifi, bukooŋ bwee tɛ̀ nuuŋ le Baraba.
Le bɛniiŋ bɛ be banchɛ, Pailɛt bii li be laa, “Nɛ wɛki le mbuu nuuŋ noo li yih yi ncha-a? Nɛ wɛki le mbuu Baraba, mɔɔ Jiso wu bɛ teenyi le Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ le?”
Tɛ̀ gii biiti lɛ kifɛ tɛ̀ gii kii le be nyɛ baa Jiso li tsaŋ yee li, kii shéŋ tɛ̀ yɛɛti be bɛ wu.
Le ni nuuŋ mfi wu tɛ̀ shee fɛ kintindɛ ki ti shiiti sɛki bɛnsa-a, kwɛsi tuumi ntoŋ li wuu, tee le, “Kiiŋ ɔ ni fɛ fiee bɛ wi wɛɛ kɛ. Ɛ wi wu tsaaŋ. Ntiiti ni kifɛ kifiee ŋwɛɛ kɛɛ bɛ mi butuu bu bɛŋ buni ŋge kii wu.”
Le Pailɛt bii lɛ, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ tɛ̀ kunyi le bɛniiŋ ni be tiiti le buu nuuŋ Baraba, bɛ mɛɛshi bɛ Jiso.
Ŋgɔmina wɛ dza bii li bee laa, “Wi wu nɛ wɛki le nchinɛ li bɛniiŋ bɛ bɛfɛ bani-i linti nuuŋ noo?” Be tuu le, “Baraba.”
Pailɛt tuu bii li be laa, “Ɛ mi mbuu lɛ, nse ŋgeeŋ bɛ Jiso wu bɛ teenyi le Kinsofu ki Nyɔ tɛ̀ kaachɛ?” Be bɛchu tee le, “Bɛ taaŋ wu li kintaaŋ li bu tamfu.”
Kaari bii laa, “Bɛ taaŋ wu kii la? Fiee fi bifi fi wu fɛ nuuŋ la?” Be tuu be giiŋgi limfwe bɛ dzaŋu le, “Bɛ taaŋ wu li kintaaŋ li.”
Le Pailɛt ŋɛŋ le dze lu kɛ, le ŋkweŋɛ bɛchi chɛ. Dzɔ dzɔɔ, tsootsɛ tsaŋ yee lu li kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ limfwe, tee le, “Tsaŋ yɛŋ nuuŋ yɛ fɛ kwe yi wi wuni-i kɛ. Kiiɔ nuuŋ beŋ.”
Bɛniiŋ bɛchu tuu li wuu le, “Iiŋ, gɛɛ ŋgɔŋ mee nuuŋ li bikoo bisɛ-ɛŋ mɔɔ li bɔɔŋ bɛsɛ-ɛŋ.”
Pailɛt biee buu Baraba si be tɛ̀ wɛki, tee le be fiaamfiɛ Jiso, tuu nyɛ le be gɛɛŋ be taaŋ wu li kintaaŋ li.
Bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi-i bɛ ŋgɔmina dzɔ Jiso be lɛ bɛ wu lɛntɔ we-e, bintutu bi bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi-i bichu banchɛ bi kɛnɛ Jiso lɛnti.
Bi buushɛ wu ndú bi dzɔ ndu yi bumfɔŋ yi yɛchi bi chuumɛ wu li bwiŋ,
be dzɔ bifafu be lo kifɔ ki bumfɔ-ɔŋ lu be beeŋ wu lifa be tuu be nyɛ wu kimbaaŋ lɛ kibɛnɛ kee ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ le ki ni ki nuuŋ si kimbaaŋ kee. Be bɛchi be bɛɛ be guundi wu limfwe be choosi wu be tiiti le, “Buri, Mfɔŋ wu Bɛjuu!”
Si be feti lɛ, be kwiyi wu bɛ budii li bwiŋ, be fi kimbaaŋ kɛɛ be tuki wu bɛ ki li fa.
Le be mɛɛshi nchoosɛ wu lɛ, be buu wu ndu yi bumfɔŋ yɛ, be lii wu nuuŋ ndu ye li wuu bwiŋ, be biee be dzɔ wu le be gɛɛŋ be taaŋ wu li kintaaŋ li.
Si be tɛ̀ giiŋgi lɛ, be busɛ li wi wumu wu li kitoŋ ki Sɛli-iŋ, bukooŋ bwee nuuŋ le Simu. Be kaŋ wi wuni le too kintaaŋ ki Jiso-o.
Be tɛ̀ gɛɛŋ be bo kintsii kimu ki bɛ teenyi le Gɔɔgɔɔta, (Bukooŋ buni nuuŋ le Kintsii ki Kiŋgefi-i,)
be nyɛ wuu mbiiŋ ɛ bɛ finsɛ bɛ fiee fimu fi lochi si kikurɛ le woŋ. Se nuuŋ le, tɛ mɔŋ, faaŋ ŋ'wonu.
Se be ta wu li kintaaŋ li, be dzɔ ndú yee be toŋ kaŋ lu le be gachɛ li yi yi bee.
Si be tɛ̀ fɛ lɛ, be sheeyɛ fe be kiichi wu.
Be tsɛɛ kiŋwaati ki doonchi fiee fi bɛ ta wu li kintaaŋ li kii fi, be ta fi li kintaaŋ li lɛ kikoo kee li lɛwe le, “Wuni nuuŋ Jiso, Mfɔŋ wu Bɛjuu.”
Be tayɛ tɛ bɛyi bɛfɛ li bintaaŋ li bɛ Jiso, wumu lɛ kibɛnɛ ki kigɔŋɛ-ɛ, wumu lɛ kibɛnɛ ki kimɛsɛ-ɛ.
Bɛniiŋ kɛti be ŋiŋgi Jiso be sɛɛsi bikoo, be tsuki wu bɛ tsooŋ,
be tiiti le, “Wɛ wu tɛ̀ tiiti le ɛ bɛ shaanshɛ yih yi muntofi ɔ kaari ɔ gwaŋ li jo taa li, sofɛ yi ya! Ɔɔ nuuŋ ŋwanɛ Nyɔ, shee li kintaaŋ kɛɛ li.”
Bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ tɛ̀ choosi wu be tiiti le,
“Tɛ̀ gii suuti bɛniiŋ bamu, kɛɛ nuuŋ soo yi yee nsiŋ. Mɔɔ Mfɔŋ wu bɛniiŋ bɛ Isɛlɛɛ. Shee li kintaaŋ li dɛɛni, se tɛ beŋ li wuu.
Tɛ̀ nyɛ yi yee li Nyɔ-ɔ. Ɛ Nyɔ kɔŋgisi wu, yi soo wu dɛɛni, si tɛ̀ kweŋgi le nuuŋ ŋwanɛ Nyɔ.”
Bɛyi bɛ bɛ tɛ̀ ta li bintaaŋ li bɛ Jiso baa, tɛ̀ tsuki wu bɛ ntsooŋ tɛ.
Le nshaaŋ yuusɛ, lɛkuuŋ dza le jiŋ kwɛɛŋ kwikwi, gɛɛŋ bo jobɛ bikaa bitɛɛtu lɛ fɛmfo-o.
Le mfi gɛɛŋ bo si jobɛ bikaa bitɛɛtu, Jiso dza waŋ lɛwe ŋge le, “Hɛli, Hɛli, lama sabatani.” Fi nuuŋ le, “Nyɔ yɛŋ, Nyɔ yɛŋ, ɔ lɔŋ mi ni kii la?”
Bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ tɛ̀ lemi fe woo lɛ, be tee le, “Wi wuni teenyɔɔ Ɛlaja.”
Wi wu be wumu letɛ mfwaa mumkpaŋ dzɔ kifiiŋ, fooŋ li mbiiŋ mɛ mgbanyi, sɔ li fintiiŋ li, nɛɛki le woŋ.
Se nuuŋ le, bɛniiŋ bamu tee le, “Tɛ leŋ kwɛ, tɛ ŋɛŋ laa Ɛlaja gii bɛ soo wu le!”
Jiso ka waŋ lɛwe ŋge, nyɛ fiana yee li tsaŋ yi Nyɔ-ɔ.
Fi dza fi ka le, ndu yi tɛ̀ gatini yih yi muntofi lɛnti tɛ dza yi batɛ kintikinti, mbɛɛchɛ fɛ we mbɔɔwu mbochu fɛkwiiŋ li biŋkɛ bifɛ. Nshɛ sɛɛsɛ, bimbaŋ weyɛ,
dzíŋ gwiyɛ, se bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kwiyɛ lɛ dze yi Nyɔ-ɔ ŋge kaari be bo li kwe-e.
Le Jiso bo li kwe-e, bɛniiŋ bɛlu dza be gɛɛŋ li kitoŋ ki wuuti Jɛrosalɛŋ bɛniiŋ ŋge ŋɛŋ be.
Le te kikoo wu bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi-i, bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ bee be tɛ̀ nuuŋ fe be kiichi Jiso baa tuu be ŋɛŋ tɛ si nshɛ sɛɛsɛ, bɛ biee bichu bi tɛ̀ kɛti, chɛnɛ kɔɔ be ŋge. Be tee le, “Chɛɛŋ, chɛɛŋ wi wuni tɛ̀ nuuŋ Ŋwanɛ Nyɔ.”
Bukɛɛŋ ŋge tɛ̀ lemi tɛ fe mfiiŋ be bichi. Bukɛɛŋ bani tɛ̀ gii be nuuŋ bɛ tɛ̀ dza Galilii be biki Jiso, be fii wu.
Lɛ bee lɛnti tɛ̀ nuuŋ, Maariya Madaliŋ mɔɔ Maariya wu ni Jeeŋ bee Jɔsɛ, mɔɔ ni bɔɔŋ bɛ Dzɛbɛdii.
Le ni nuuŋ lɛ fɛmfo-o, wi wu biee wumu wu Arimatia dza bɛ bukooŋ bwee tɛ̀ nuuŋ le Jɔsɛ. Tɛ̀ nuuŋ wi kintutu ki Jiso wumu.
Gɛɛŋ ŋɛŋ Pailɛt, lɛkɛ le nyɛ gwini chi Jiso le gɛɛŋ diyɛ. Nɛɛ lɛ Pailɛt tee le, be gɛɛŋ be nyɛ li wuu.
Jɔsɛ fi gwini chilu biee fiɛmɛ fɛ ndu yi wuuti-i,
gɛɛŋ giiki lɛ dziŋ yi tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ fiɛŋ, yi bɛ tɛ̀ chɔ lɛ kimbaŋ, se biiŋgi tɛtɛ chi nɔŋa chi banyɛ fweeŋ wu dziŋ yilu, dza.
Maariya Madaliŋ bɛ Maariya wumu wɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ fe, be shee li dziŋ yilu lichiŋ kibɛɛ.
Le butuu woo, ɛ jobɛ chi be tɛ̀ shiiŋ be nachi biee kii bu bɛshiinshi bɛ chi ka, bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa bɛ Bɛfarasii gɛɛŋ be ŋɛŋ Pailɛt,
be tee li wuu le, “Wi wu nyɔŋa, tɛ kimi baa fiee fi wi wu binsɛɛ wɛ tɛ̀ tiiti mfi wu tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ lu. Tɛ̀ tee le, gii ni nuuŋ jo taa kaari bo li kwe-e.
Si fi tɛ̀ nuuŋ lɛ, se tee bɛniiŋ le be gɛɛŋ be ni be kiichi dziŋ nsiiŋ gɛɛŋ bo jo taa, kifɛ tɛ chɛndi baa le bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu gii be dza be gɛɛŋ be yi gwini chee be tuu be ni be tiiti li bɛniiŋ li le, ‘Wu boɔ li kwe-e.’ Ɛ be fɛ lɛ, binsɛɛ bi bee bi dɛɛni yaa bi ŋkosi.”
Pailɛt se tee li bee le, “Dzɔɔ yɛɛŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi-i nɛɛ be nɛ gɛɛŋ, nɛ tee le be ni be kiichi dziŋ yilu bujɔŋ si nuuŋ be kiichɛ.”
Nɛɛ lɛ, be se gɛɛŋ be bɔsɛyi be bɛŋɛ fweeŋ wu dziŋ yilu, be fɛ ŋkiki li tɛtɛ chi bɛ tɛ̀ baŋɛ fweeŋ wu dziŋ yilu chɛɛ, be gɛɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi le be ni be kiichi.
Le jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi bɛ chi ka, le butuu ni bu wuuti, nuuŋ jobɛ chi ŋkosi li fuu li, Maariya Madaliŋ bee Maariya wumu wɛ gɛɛŋ le be bichɛ lɛ dziŋ.
Fi se ka le, nshɛ tɛ̀ dza yi sɛɛsɛ bɛ buŋga, kifɛ nchindaa wu Taa tɛ̀ shee liboo bɛ biiŋgi tɛtɛ chi bɛ tɛ̀ baŋɛ fweeŋ wu dziŋ yɛɛ lu, se shee li chi-i liwe.
Nchindaa wulu tɛ̀ gii nuuŋ ɛ bushi bwee miɛŋini si dzaaŋ ti lɛɛbi lɛ, ndu yee tɛ̀ nɛŋgi ncherere si kikuŋ.
Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kiichi dziŋ baa ŋɛŋ lɛ, be chɛŋ ŋge, be kɛɛti ni kikiki, be weyɛ fɛkwiiŋ be gimɛ si gooŋ yi bɛniiŋ.
Nchindaa wu Nyɔ wulu tee li bukɛɛŋ baa li le, “Kiiŋ nɛ ni nɛ chɛndi kɛ. Ŋkiiɔ le nɛ wɛki baa nuuŋ Jiso wu bɛ tuu bɛ ta li kintaaŋ li.
Mɛɛŋ yɛ fɛni kɛ, wu bo ɔ li kwe-e kituŋ si tɛ̀ tiiti lɛ. Bɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ ŋɛŋ fɛ tuu gimi fe.
Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ tsɛkɛtsɛkɛ nɛ tee li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u le wu boɔ li kwe-e, le wu tooɔ mbaaŋ limfwe li bee giiŋgi Galilii. Nɛ gii nɛ ŋɛŋ wu le. Yikɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ woo mi nteeɔ beŋ.”
Bukɛɛŋ baa biee be dza fɛ dziŋ fɛlu tsɛkɛtsɛkɛ jaaŋ nuuŋ bɛ be, se nuuŋ le, be tɛ kɛmɛ kinɛɛtinɛ kinɔŋa, be letini be giiŋgi le be gɛɛŋ be tee li bɔɔŋ bɛ Jiso bɛ kintutu.
Si bɛ tɛ mɛɛŋ be giiŋgi lɛ, fi ka le Jiso tɛ bikɛ bɛ be, tee li bee le, “Mi n'yɛsɔɔ beŋ.” Be bɛ li wu lichiŋ, be we be kɛmɛ wu li bikaa li, be boŋ wu.
Jiso se tee li bee le, “Kiiŋ nɛ ni nɛ chɛndi kɛ. Gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ tee li bɛŋwaanɛŋ le be ni be giiŋgi Galilii ɛ le lɛ be gii be ŋɛŋ mi.”
Fɛ bukɛɛŋ baa tɛ dza be giiŋgi lɛ, fi se ka le bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi-i bɛ tɛ kiichi dziŋ baa tɛ dza be gɛɛŋ fɛ kito-oŋ, le be gɛɛŋ be tee fiee fichu fi tɛ ka li bɛte muntofi bɛ nɔŋa bɛ nɔŋa-a.
Bɛte muntofi bɛlu konchɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ sɛki kwɛɛŋ bee be shee be cho ntaŋ, be nyɛ kwa ŋge li bɛniiŋ bɛ nchi baa,
be tee li bee le, “Nɛ tiiti li bɛniiŋ li le, bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu bɛ baa butuu be yi gwini chee be gɛɛŋ bɛ chi mfi wu tɛ tuu tɛ liiti.
Ɛ nɛ tiiti lɛ, ke fi lɛ li bintooŋ bi ŋgɔmina, ɛ wɛki le nyɛ ŋgɛ li be-eŋ, tɛ nachɛ bɛ wu, tɛ tuu le lii beŋ li ŋgɛ-ɛ kɛ.”
Bɛdɛɛni be fi kwa wulu be fɛ nɛɛ si bɛ tɛ tee li bee lɛ. Binsɛɛ kii le bɛ tɛ yi gwini chi Jiso tɛ saaŋgɛ bi gɛɛŋ li bini bi Bɛjuu lɛ bɛ tiiti nsiŋ bɛ bo bɛŋ.
Bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu bɛ Jiso-o bɛ yoofi ntsɔ mumkpaŋ baa dza be gɛɛŋ Galilii, be yɛɛ li ŋkumɛ wu Jiso tɛ tee be.
Le be gɛɛŋ be ŋɛŋ wu fe, be guumɛ be boŋ wu. Se nuuŋ le, bamu mɛŋɛ wu.
Jiso se kiiŋgi bɛ li bee lichiŋ tee li bee le, “Baa wɛŋ nyɛɔ buŋga li mi-i buchu bu liboo mɔɔ bu laaŋkwiiŋ.
Bɛdɛɛni, gɛnɛ yɛɛŋ li bitoŋ bichu-u, nɛ fɛ bɛniiŋ ni be nuuŋ bɛniiŋ beŋ bɛ kintutu, nɛ ni nɛ lisi be li dzɔɔ, li bukooŋ bu Baa wɛŋ bɛ bu Ŋwaaŋ mɔɔ bu Fiana yi Waaŋ lɛ.
Nɛ tiifi be le be ni be feti fiee fichu fi ntɛ̀ ntee li be-eŋ. Yikɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ woo, ŋgii ni nuuŋ bɛ beŋ mfi kwi gɛɛŋ bo li mfi wu ntsɛ wu li nshɛ yini-i gii ma.”
Wuni nuuŋ ntoŋ wu dzeeŋ wu kii Jiso Krai wu Ŋwanɛ Nyɔ.
Fi tɛ̀ bɛchi nɛɛ si Ɛsaya wu ntomfɔŋ wu Nyɔ tɛ̀ tsɛɛ le Nyɔ tiiti yɛ le, “Yikɛ ɔ woo, ŋgii ntuumi wi wɛŋ wu ntoŋ ni tuuti mbaaŋ li wɛ-ɛ, gii gɛɛŋ nachɛ dze ya.
Jɛ yi wi dii yɛ libuka le bɛ nachɛ dze yi Taa, bɛ leeki yi ni yi nuuŋ tsaaŋ.”
Bɛdɛɛni, wi wumu wu bɛ tɛ̀ teenyi le Jɔɔŋ Nlisulidzɔɔ tɛ̀ dza busɛ libuka, fenjisi li bɛniiŋ li le be fiiki shéŋ yibe, lii be li dzɔɔ Nyɔ se feeki bibifi bi bee.
Bɛniiŋ se tɛ̀ dzɛti li bitoŋ bi kwɛɛŋ wu Judiya kwikwi mɔɔ li kitoŋ ki Jɛrosalɛ-ɛŋ kichu be giiŋgi lɛ Jɔɔŋ li, be teyi bibifi bi bee, se lisi be li dzɔɔ, li Dzɔɔ yi Joodaaŋ.
Jɔɔŋ tɛ̀ lisi ndú yi bɛ nachɛ bɛ dzúŋ yi nyaŋ yimi yi bɛ teenyi le kamɛɛ, tɛ̀ kɛndi kitsaa litiŋ ɛ bɛ nachɛ bɛ dzi yi nyaŋ, jii nuuŋ tsóma bɛ ŋgɔɔ yi litɔɔ.
Tɛ̀ gii fenjisi lɛ, tiiti le, “Wumu bɛɛɔ lɛ mi-i jiŋ wu ko wu yaa mi, mɛɛŋɔ mɔɔ ki kɔchɛ kɛ le ŋguumɛ mfanchɛ bikpɔ biee kɛ.
Nlisɔɔ beŋ nuuŋ li dzɔɔ, se nuuŋ le, gii lii fiee beŋ nuuŋ li tsaŋ yi Fiana yi Waaŋ li.”
Nɛɛ li jo yɛɛ, Jiso dza Nasarɛ kimbɛ ki Galilii, bɛ Jɔɔŋ lii wu li dzɔɔ, li Dzɔɔ yi Joodaaŋ.
Nɛɛ si Jiso tɛ̀ buti li dzɔɔ ni, biee ŋɛŋ si kiboo gwiyɛ, Fiana yi Waaŋ shiiti yi bɛɛ li wuu bwiŋ si kibimɛ.
Jɛ se yɔ liboo le, “Ɔ nuuŋ Ŋwanɛŋ wu shéŋ, ŋ'wuki bujɔŋ bɛ wɛ ŋge.”
Fiana yi Waaŋ biee yi fɛ mfwaa mumkpaŋ Jiso gɛɛŋ tsiiŋ libuka.
Tɛ nuuŋ lu li jo mbaanyɛɛ li, Sataŋ mɔnchi wu. Tɛ nuuŋ lu lɛ, bɛ nyáŋ yi tɔɔ, bɛnchindaa bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ bichi lɛ wuu.
Bɛ tɛ̀ dza bɛ kɔɔ Jɔɔŋ bɛ gɛɛ li yih yi ncha-a. Le ni nuuŋ lɛjiŋ lɛlu, Jiso gɛɛŋ Galilii, fenjisi ntoŋ wu dzeeŋ wu kii Nyɔ le.
Tɛ̀ bɛchi fenjisi, tiiti le, “Mfi kɔchɔɔ, bumfɔŋ bu Nyɔ-ɔ bwɛɛ tsɛkɛtsɛkɛ. Fiiki yɛɛŋ shéŋ yinɛ, nɛ beŋ li ntoŋ wu dzeeŋ wuni-i.”
Jiso dza le ni kɛti li Libɛ chi Galilii lichiŋ, ŋɛŋ Simu bee ŋwaani wu Andolo be lendi gwii lɛ libɛ-ɛ, ɛ nimɛ chi bee tɛ nuuŋ nsúuŋ yi kɔfɛ.
Jiso tee li bee le, “Biee yɛɛŋ mi mfɛ nɛ ni nɛ keeti nuuŋ bɛniiŋ.”
Mfwaa mumkpaŋ, be biee be chinɛ gii yibe fe, be biki wu.
Jiso tuu kiiŋgi gɛɛŋ limfwe niiŋ, ŋɛŋ Jeeŋ bee ŋwaani wu Jɔɔŋ, bɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bɔɔŋ bɛ Dzɛbɛdii, bee be nuuŋ lɛ ŋgo-o be tuushi gii yi nsúuŋ.
Jiso se tuu teeŋ tɛ be. Be shɛ tee wu be lɛ ŋgo bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ be tɛ̀ dzɔ le be ni be nindi li bee, be se biee wu.
Jiso bee be se dza be gɛɛŋ li kitoŋ ki Kapanu-uŋ. Le ni nuuŋ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi, Jiso se biee gɛɛŋ li yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ tiifi bɛniiŋ lu.
Bɛniiŋ wuki, wa tii be bɛ ntiifɛ we, kifɛ tɛ tiifi si wi wu kɛmi buŋga bu ntiifɛ-ɛ. Tɛ̀ gii tiifi yɛ si bɛniiŋ bɛ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ ti shiiŋ be tiifi lɛ kɛ.
Nɛɛ li mfi wulu-u, wumu tɛ dza fɛsi li yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ yilu-u, ɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ wi wu fiana yi tii tɛ̀ nuuŋ wu libwiŋ.
Le lɛ lu, biee waŋ le, “Jiso wu Nasarɛ, ɛ la fi ɔ wɛki le ɔ fɛ bɛ bee? Ɔ bɛ le ɔ lɛɛshɛ bee ni? Ŋkiiɔ wi wu nuuŋ wɛ. Ɛ wɛ wi wu Waaŋ wu dza fɛ Nyɔ-ɔ.”
Jiso waŋ fiana yi tii yilu, tee le, “Makɛ, bo li wi wuni-i!”
Fiana yi tii yilu se fɛ wu we fɛkwiiŋ kakini, yi waŋ lɛwe ŋge, yi se bo li wuu bwiŋ.
Le bɛniiŋ ŋɛŋ lɛ, bimfimu wondɛ be, be bɛchi be tiiti li yi yi bee, be biiti laa, “Fini nuuŋ la? Ɛ ntiifɛ wumu wu fwɛŋ ni? Wi wuni kɛmɔɔ buŋga bu wanɛ mɔɔ fiana yi tii yi wuki li wuu.”
Mfwaa mumkpaŋ, ntoŋ wu kii Jiso saaŋgɛ gɛɛŋ bintsii bichu bi li kimbe ki Galilii.
Jiso bo li yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ yilu-u, gɛɛŋ li yih yi Simu bee Andolo-o, ɛ Jeeŋ bee Jɔɔŋ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bee be.
Tɛ̀ nuuŋ ɛ mwɛsɛ Simu tɛ̀ gimi lu, gendi bɛ kiŋkɛŋkɛ. Nɛɛ si Jiso tɛ̀ lɛ li yih yilu lɛ, be biee be tee wu kii kwɛɛŋ wulu.
Jiso gɛɛŋ fɛ tɛ̀ gimi fɛɛ, kɛmɛ wu li kibɛnɛ-ɛ, tsaaki wu we. Kiŋkɛŋkɛ kɛɛ se biee ki chikɛ li wuu, dza we, bichɛ fiee fijɛ nyɛ be.
Le ni nuuŋ lɛ fɛmfo-o booyaa jobɛ sechi, be tuu be bɛɛ bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛchu bɛ tɛ̀ gendi mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ kiŋkundi-i tɛ̀ ŋwɛki bɛ be lɛ Jiso-o.
Kitoŋ kilu kichu se banchɛ lɛ fweeŋ.
Wɔnchɛ bɛniiŋ ŋge bɛ tɛ̀ kɛmi chigɔŋ chichi chichi, tuu bushi tɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ kiŋkundi-i ŋge li bɛniiŋ bamu-u. Ɛ busi lɔɔ, tɛ beŋ le bɛnchindaa bɛlu ni be yeti kɛ, kifɛ be tɛ̀ kii wi wu tɛ nuuŋ wu.
Le ni mɛɛŋ fɛŋwɛɛ taantaaŋ lɛkuuŋ mɛɛŋ fiii Jiso dza we, bo gɛɛŋ fɛ kintsii kimu wuu mbiiŋ lɛki li Nyɔ-ɔ.
Simu bee bɛniiŋ bɛ bee be tɛ̀ nuuŋ, shɛ be bo be gɛɛŋ le be gɔɔŋ wu.
Be gɛɛŋ be ŋɛŋ wu, be tee li wuu le, “Bɛniiŋ bɛchu bee be shɛ be wɛki wɛ.”
Jiso tuu fiee li bee le, “Tɛ lenchi tɛ gɛɛŋ li bitoŋ bimu nse mfeenji tɛ jɛ yi Nyɔ le. Ɛ fiee fi ntɛ̀ mbɛ kii fi.”
Se deŋgi kimbe ki Galilii kichu fenjisi jɛ yi Nyɔ li yíh yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ yibee, buushi bɔɔŋ bɛ kiŋkundi-i li yí yi bɛniiŋ li.
Wumu wu tɛ̀ gendi bɛ chigɔŋ chi nɔŋa tɛ̀ dza bɛ toŋ núŋ Jiso limfwe, lɛki wu tiiti le, “Ɔ nuuŋ nɛɛ ɔ wɔnchɛ mi ni ŋ'wuuti, ɔɔ kɔŋgisi lɔ.”
Nshiiŋ kɔɔ Jiso, nɛɛki kibɛnɛ koŋ li wuu, tee li wuu le, “Ŋkɔŋgisɔɔ, tɛmi lɛ, ɔ ni ɔ wuuti.”
Mfwaa mumkpaŋ, chigɔŋ chi nɔŋa chilu biee chi chinɛ li wuu, tɛmi, woo.
Jiso se tee li wuu le ni giiŋgi, bɔsɛyi chiinsɛ li wuu,
tee le, “Ŋɛŋ le kiiŋ ɔ ni tee li wi-i kɛ. Se nuuŋ le, gɛnɛ ɔ doonchɛ yi ya li te muntofi-i, ɔ se nyɛ nya yi Mɔɔsɛ tɛ̀ tiiti le wi kɛmi le nyɛ le doonchɛ li bɛniiŋ li le wu tɛmɔɔ li chigɔŋ chini-i wuuti.”
Si Jiso chiinsɛ lɛ, wi wulu se tuu gɛɛŋ yaki fiee filu. Ntoŋ wulu se saaŋgɛ, dze foo yi Jiso nuuŋ tuu ni lii li kito-oŋ gbanaa. Se ba fiee nuuŋ litɔɔ, bɛniiŋ dzɛti li bitsii li, li bitsii li, be bɛɛ lɛ wuu.
Le jo ka niiŋ, Jiso kaari to lijiŋ Kapanuŋ. Bɛniiŋ woo le wɛ fɛkuuŋ kituŋ,
be banchɛ be bɛ fe ŋge, dze foo yi nuuŋ wi tɔmi kikaa mɔɔ nuuŋ fweeŋ, se fenjisi jɛ yi Nyɔ li bee.
Bɛniiŋ bamu dza be bɛɛ be bɛnɛɛ bɛ wi wumu ɛ be sumɛ wu fɛ kida-aŋ, ɛ ŋgwɛ tɛ̀ kɔɔ wu kimbɛ kimumkpaŋ.
Fi yaa be fɛ nuuŋ be gɛɛŋ bɛ wu fɛ Jiso-o kifɛ bɛniiŋ tɛ̀ yiŋgɛ fe ŋge. Be se beeŋ nuuŋ lɛ yi-ih lɛwe, be tɔ kiyɛ. Le be tɔ lɛ, be shiiki wi wulu fɛ fiee fi tɛ̀ gimi fe fiɛɛ.
Jiso ŋɛŋ si be gɛɛ shéŋ li wuu, se tee li wi wu ŋgwɛ tɛ̀ wu kɔɔ kimbɛ kimumkpaŋ wɛ-ɛ le, “Sinɛŋ, mi mfeekɔɔ bibifi bio.”
Bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ tɛ̀ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ bɛ tɛ̀ shee yɛ fe be wuki se bɛchi be ŋuŋini lɛ shéŋ lɛ shéŋ, be biiti laa,
“Wi wuni tiiti ni, kii la? Dzetɔɔ kintsii ki Nyɔ-ɔ. Ɛ noo wu nuuŋ feeki bibifi fuki Nyɔ nsiŋ?”
Jiso biee kɛɛ li shéŋ yee li fiee fi be tɛ̀ beechi, bii li bee laa, “Nɛ kɛmi ŋwaani bani bɛmbeechɛ li shéŋ yinɛ ni kii la?
Fi tsɛkɛ fi tefɛ li wi wuni nuuŋ fi la? Ɛ ntefu le mi mfeekɔɔ bibifi biee mɔɔ le dzɔ kidaŋ kee ni giiŋgi le?
Se nuuŋ le, ŋgii mfɛ nɛ kɛɛ le Ŋwanɛwi kɛmi buŋga laaŋkwiiŋ bu fekisɛ bibifi.” Le tee lɛ, biee tee li wi wu ŋgwɛ tɛ̀ kɔɔ wu wɛ-ɛ le,
“Dza we ɔ dzɔɔ kidaŋ ko ɔ ni ɔ giiŋgi li yih.”
Se dza we, dzɔ kidaŋ kee buti bɛniiŋ bɛchu bichi wu. Le be nɛŋ lɛ, bimfimu wondɛ be, be bɛchi be yɔɔnchi Nyɔ, be tiiti le, “Tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ baa saa ki ŋɛŋ kɛ ŋwaani fini fiee kɛ.”
Jiso tuu dza gɛɛŋ li libɛ-ɛ lichiŋ, kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ bɛ fe, bɛchi tiifi be.
Le dza ni giiŋgi, ŋɛŋ Lebi wu ŋwanɛ Afiyus, ɛ wu shee fɛ kintsii kee ki nimɛ-ɛ, kundi kiŋwaati. Jiso tee li wuu le, “Ɔ biki mi!” Dza we biki wu.
Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu gɛɛŋ be jii biee li Lebi yih bɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ kundi kiŋwaati mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ bifi. Ŋwaani bani bɛniiŋ tɛ̀ shiiŋ be biki wu ŋge.
Bɛfarasii bɛ tɛ̀ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ ŋɛŋ si Jiso jii biee bee bɛniiŋ bɛ bifi mɔɔ bɛ tɛ̀ kundi kiŋwaati, be se bii li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u laa, “Ɛ kii la fi jii biee bee bɛniiŋ bɛ kundi kiŋwaati mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bɛ bifi bamu?”
Le Jiso woo si be bii lɛ, tee li bee le, “Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛɛmi ti wɛki yɛ wi wu ntsi kɛ. Ɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ gendi bɛ ti wɛki. Mɛɛŋɔ ki mbɛ kɛ le nteeŋ nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ nuuŋ tsaaŋ kɛ. Mi mbɛ le nteeŋ nuuŋ bɛ bifi.”
Tɛ nuuŋ mfi wumu ɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ Jɔɔŋ lɛ bɛ kintutu-u, mɔɔ bɛ Bɛfarasii tɛ̀ jiti biee. Bɛniiŋ bamu tuu be bɛ be bii li Jiso laa, “Fi geeŋ fi bɔɔŋ bɛ kintutu-u bɛ Jɔɔŋ lɛ, mɔɔ bɛ Bɛfarasii jiti biee, se bɔɔŋ bo bɛ kintutu-u tɛ ji tɛ kɛ?”
Jiso tuu li bee le, “Nuuŋ bɛ teeŋ bɛniiŋ fɛ bugoo li be gɛɛŋ be tuu be ni be jiti biee nyuŋ wutso mɛɛŋ bee be ni? Nuuŋ be tɛ ji biee bijɛ fɛ mɛɛŋ bee be kɛ.
Se nuuŋ le, mfi gii naa bɛ wu bɛ gii bɛ fi nyuŋ wutso wulu li bee, be se bɛchi be ni be jiti biee bijɛ li mfi wulu-u.
Nuuŋ wi tɛ dzɔ shɛŋgɛ yi ndu yi fiɛŋ le tuushɛ ndu yi fichi lu kɛ. Ɛ wu fɛ lɛ, nshɛŋgɛ yi ndu yilu mɛɛshi yi gaamɛ ndu yi fichi yilu bu gaamɛ, fiooŋ yi nuuŋ fe se mɛɛshi yi ko yi yaa si yi tɛ saa yi nuuŋ.
Nuuŋ wi tɛ gɛɛ mbiiŋ mɛ fɛŋ lɛ kibɛɛŋ ki bɛ nachɛ bɛ dzi yi nyaŋ, yi kɔɔ yi doŋ kɛ. Ɛ wu fɛ lɛ, mbiiŋ mɛ fɛŋ mɛlu wo kibɛɛŋ ki fichi kilu, mbiiŋ bɛ kibɛɛŋ kilu la li yee li. Fi chɛɛŋ fiɛɛ le, bɛ kɛmi le bɛ gɛɛ mbiiŋ mɛ fɛŋ nuuŋ lɛ kibɛɛŋ ki fɛ-ɛŋ.”
Tɛ̀ nuuŋ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi chimu, Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u tɛ̀ deŋgi be kɛti li wɛ wu giiŋ wumu-u. Bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u bɛchi be soomi bikoo bi giiŋ lɛ be jii.
Bɛfarasii ŋɛŋ lɛ, be bii li Jiso laa, “Bichɛ ɔ ŋɛŋ, fi geeŋ fi bɔɔŋ bo bɛ kintutu-u feti fiee fi nchi mɛɛŋ ki be-eŋ le wi fɛ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi kɛ?”
Jiso bii tɛ li bee laa, “Nɛ mɛɛŋ baa saa ki teeŋ kɛ lɛ Kiŋwaati ki Nyɔ-ɔ si dzeeŋ tɛ̀ wuu Mfɔŋ Daafi bee bɛniiŋ bee fɛ ni?
Tɛ̀ nuuŋ mfi wu Abiata tɛ̀ nuuŋ kikoo ki bɛte muntofi-i, Daafi lɛ li yih yi Nyɔ-ɔ dzɔ kibele ki bɛ tɛ̀ tsaa bɛ gɛɛ le ɛ ki Nyɔ-ɔ ki te muntofi tɛ̀ nyɛ wu, ji nyɛ mɔɔ bɛniiŋ bee, ɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ nchi le nuuŋ wi tɛ ji kibele kilu fuki bɛte muntofi nsiŋ kɛ.”
Jiso se mɛɛshi tee li bee le, “Nyɔ tɛ̀ gɛɛ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi kii wi. Tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki tɔŋ kɛ wi kii jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi kɛ.
Se nuuŋ le, Ŋwanɛwi nuuŋ Te Kikoo wu bwɛɛshiinshi.”
Jiso tuu gɛɛŋ lɛ li yih yi nlɛkɛ li Nyɔ-ɔ. Wi wumu tɛ̀ nuuŋ lu ɛ ŋgwɛ kɔɔ wu li kibɛnɛ-ɛ.
Bɛniiŋ bamu tɛ̀ nuuŋ lu be wɛki fiee fi nuuŋ be kayɛ li Jiso-o nsiŋ, be se toŋ lii li wuu be bichi laa gii wɔnchɛ wi wulu jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi le.
Jiso se tee li wi wu ŋgwɛ tɛ̀ kɔɔ wu wɛɛ le, “Dza we ɔ bɛ fɛni.”
Le mwɛ bɛ, Jiso bii li bɛniiŋ li laa, “Fiee fi nchi beenchi le nuuŋ wi fɛ jobɛ chi bɛshiinshi nuuŋ fi la? Ɛ mfɛru fiee fi dzeeŋ, mɔɔ fi bifi le? Nsofu wi, mɔɔ ŋ'wo wi le?” Be chikɛ.
Jiso dzɔ shéŋ bɛ be, bichɛ be bɛchu kɛnɛ, yi wɔɔ wu kii shéŋ yibe yi bifi. Tee li wi wu ŋgwɛ tɛ̀ kɔɔ wu li kibɛnɛ-ɛ wɛɛ le, “Nɛɛki kibɛnɛ ko.” Nɛɛki ki, ki se biee ki tɛmi.
Bɛfarasii se bo, be gɛɛŋ bɛ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ bɛ Mfɔŋ Hɛrɔ-ɔ, be gɛɛŋ be lii ntsuuŋ si be gii be wo Jiso.
Jiso bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u dza fe be gɛɛŋ fɛ libɛ chi Galilii. Kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ ki nɔŋa biee wu fe. Bɛniiŋ bamu tɛ dza kimbɛ ki Galilii bɛ ki Judiya.
Bamu dza tɛ̀ Jɛrosalɛŋ bamu kimbɛ ki Idumea, bamu dzɛti liwiŋ li Dzɔɔ yi Joodaaŋ, bamu bimbɛ bi Tayɛ bɛ bi Sidɔ-ɔŋ. Kintutu ki nɔŋa kilu tɛ̀ bɛ nɛɛ lɛ kifɛ be tɛ̀ wuki biee bi Jiso tɛ̀ feti bichu.
Jiso dza tee li bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u le be gɔɔŋ ŋgo be nachɛ be gɛɛ se lɛ le kii kintutu kilu ni dza ki ni ki fachi wu.
Tɛ tee lɛ kifɛ tɛ̀ saa wu wɔnchɛ bɛniiŋ ŋge, bɛniiŋ bɛ chigɔ-ɔŋ se mɛɛŋ be bɛɛ le be koŋ li wuu.
Le bɛniiŋ bɛ Fiana yi tii ti ŋwɛki bɛ be tuu be ŋɛŋ Jiso, be weyɛ wu limfwe be dii be tiiti le, “Ɛ wɛ Ŋwanɛ Nyɔ.”
Si be tɛ̀ dii lɛ, Jiso gbɛɛnɛ chiinsɛ li bee bu chiinsinɛ le kiiŋ be ni fɛ le bɛniiŋ kɛɛ wu kɛ.
Tɛ̀ dza miri gɛɛŋ li ŋkumɛ-ɛ, teeŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ gii wɛki, be bɛ lɛ wuu.
Buu bɛniiŋ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ, teeŋ be le bɔɔŋ bee bɛ nto-oŋ, le ke ni nuuŋ bee be, tundi be be deŋgi be fenjisi jɛ yi Nyɔ,
be ni be kɛmi tɛ buŋga bu buushɛ bɔɔŋ bɛ kiŋkundi-i li bɛniiŋ li.
Bɛniiŋ bɛlu tɛ̀ nuuŋ: Simu, wu tɛ nyɛ bukooŋ bwee bumu le Pita.
Jeeŋ bee ŋwaani wu Jɔɔŋ bɛ tɛ nuuŋ bɔɔŋ bɛ Dzɛbɛdii, bɛ tɛ̀ nyɛ mɛŋkooŋ mɛ bee le, “Bohanɛgɛs,” mɛ nuuŋ le, “Bɔɔŋ bɛ dzaaŋ yi wɛndi-i.”
Bamu se nuuŋ Andolo, Fili, Batolomu, Maacho, Tomɛ, Jeeŋ wu ŋwanɛ Afiyus, Tajɔ, Simu wu tɛ nuuŋ wi wu kintutu ki Bɛsilɔ-ɔ,
mɔɔ Judas Iskaliyɔ wu tɛ̀ wɛɛŋ kabɛ Jiso.
Jiso tɛ̀ dza gɛɛŋ fɛ tɛ̀ tsiiŋ, kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ tuu ki banchɛ fe, bee bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu se foo dze yi jɛ biee.
Le kini kee woo, ki gɛɛŋ le ki dzɔɔ wu kifɛ bɛniiŋ tɛ̀ kweŋgi le yoomfɔɔ.
Bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ tiifi bɛnchi bɛ Nyɔ-ɔ tɛ̀ dza Jɛrosalɛŋ be bɔɔ le, be se tuu be tiiti le, “Bɛɛsɛbu wɛ li wuu bwiŋ, busɔɔ bɔɔŋ bɛ kiŋkundi-i ni, nuuŋ bɛ buŋga bu mfɔŋ wu bɛnchindaa wulu-u.”
Jiso teeŋ be, bii li bee lɛ ŋgaŋgaa li laa, “Nuuŋ Sataŋ tuu ni busi yi yee li wi-i nindee?
Ɛ kitoŋ dza ki gatɛ ki gwii kiki, ki tɛ naa leŋ kɛ.
Ɛ yih dza yi gatɛ yi gwii yi yi, yi tɛ naa leŋ kɛ.
Nɛɛ lɛ, ɛ Sataŋ dza wu gatɛ bee kintutu kee bee be tuu be gwii li yi yi bee, be tɛ naa leŋ kɛ, ni nuuŋ kimɛrisɛ kee.
Nɛ kɛɛ le wih nuuŋ yɛ lu wu nuuŋ naa lɛ li yih yi wi wu buŋga-a, kotɛ biee biee chɛɛŋ letɛ bɛ bi, fuki fɛ wu saa wu kaŋ wi wu buŋga wulu, se kotɛ biee bi li mwɛ yi nsiŋ kɛ.
Ntee beŋ chɛɛŋ le, Nyɔ gii yi feeki bibifi mɔɔ jɛ́ yi bifi chichi yi bɛniiŋ tiiti kii yi.
Se nuuŋ le, ɛ wi kweeŋ jɛ yi bifi kii Fiana yi Waaŋ, Nyɔ nuuŋ tɛ naa feeki wɛɛ wi kɛ, kifɛ wu fɛɔ bubiɛɛ bu kimakɛ.”
Jiso tɛ̀ kweeŋ lɛ kifɛ bɛniiŋ bɛlu tɛ̀ kweŋgi le fiana yi tii yɛɛ li wuu bwiŋ.
Ni Jiso bee bɛŋwaani Jiso biee be fɛsi, be leŋ lɛkuuŋ, be toŋ wi le mwɛ teeŋ wu.
Ɛ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ tɛ̀ shee yɛ ki kɛnɛ wu ki tasɛ. Be tee li wuu le, “Na bee bɛŋwaana biiti baa wɛ lɛkuuŋ.”
Jiso se bii laa, “Naaŋ bee bɛŋwaanɛŋ nuuŋ baŋ?”
Si tɛ̀ bii lɛ bichɛ bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ shee yɛ be kɛnɛ wu baa, tee le, “Baaŋ bɛnaaŋ bee bɛŋwaanɛŋ.
Wi kwikwi wu feti fiee fi Nyɔ wɛki, ɛ wu wu nuuŋ ŋwaanɛŋ bɛ dzɛ́mi yɛŋ mɔɔ bɛnaaŋ.”
Jiso tɛ̀ tuu bɛchi tiifi bɛniiŋ li libɛ-ɛ lichiŋ, ɛ kintutu ki bɛniiŋ lɛ tɛ̀ banchɛ fe weseeŋ. Se dza lɛ shee nuuŋ lɛ ŋgo-o, kintutu kilu lemi li ŋgemɛ yi dzɔɔ li, lɛ bukaka.
Tɛ̀ tiifi be biee ŋge nuuŋ lɛ ŋgaŋgaa li. Dza wa ŋgaŋgaa chimu li bee le,
“Yikɛ yɛɛŋ nɛ woo, wi tɛ̀ la le gɛɛŋ tuŋ ŋgɔ.
Le ni tumi, yimi weyɛ lɛ dze, muniiŋ bɛ mu chɔchɛ mu ji.
Yimi weyɛ fɛ kintsii ki ta-a, fɛ nshɛ nuuŋ yɛ fe ŋge kɛ. Yi biee yi bo kifɛ nshɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ yɛ fe bujɔŋ kɛ.
Le wiiŋ bɛchi mbanu, wu sooŋ ŋgɔ yilu yi wɔɔbɛ, kifɛ yi tɛ̀ mɛɛŋ ki lii kɛ gɛɛŋ le yi seri kɛ.
Ŋgɔ yimi weyɛ li bifafu-u. Bifafu bilu ko bi baanyɛ ŋgɔ yilu yi se ba ŋ'wonu muntaaŋ nsiŋ.
Ŋgɔ yimi weyɛ nuuŋ li nshɛ yi dzeeŋ li, yi bo, yi ko, yi woŋ, yaa si bɛ tɛ̀ tuŋ, lii yi yimi woŋ muntaaŋ mbaanshɛɛ, yi yimi sháŋ mbaambusɔɔ, yimi sháŋ gwii.”
Le Jiso wa lɛ biee mɛɛshi le, “Wi wu kɛmi bintooŋ mwɛ woo.”
Jiso tɛ̀ nuuŋ wuu mbiiŋ, bɛniiŋ bamu bɛ bee be tɛ̀ nuuŋ mɔɔ bɔɔŋ bee bɛ kintutu-u bɛ yoofi ntsɔ bɛfɛ baa tɛ̀ bii li wuu kii ŋgaŋgaa chilu.
Tuu li bee le, “Ɛ li be-eŋ bɛ Nyɔ doonchɛ yɛ biee bi li bumfɔŋ bwee li bi nuuŋ lɛ munyiikɔɔ li. Se nuuŋ le, li bɛniiŋ bamu-u fiee fichu fiɛɛ nuuŋ lɛ ŋgaŋgaa li,
ke be se ni be bichi, be tɛ ŋɛŋ kɛ, be ni be yiki, be tɛ woo kɛ. Bee nuuŋ yɛ lɛ kɛ dɛɛŋ be fiiki shéŋ yibe, Nyɔ feeki bibifi bi bee.”
Jiso dza bii li bɛniiŋ bɛ tɛ̀ nuuŋ bɛ wu baa laa, “Fi nuuŋ le nɛ mɛɛŋ ki kɛɛ kɛ fiee fi ŋgaŋgaa chini tiiti kɛ ni? Ɛ nɛ mɛɛŋ ki kɛɛ kɛ chini kɛ, nɛ gii nɛ geeŋ nɛ se kɛɛ ŋgaŋgaa yimi?
Ŋgɔ yi wi wulu tɛ̀ tumi yɛ ɛ jɛ yi Nyɔ.
Ŋgɔ yi tɛ̀ weyɛ lɛ dze yɛ nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ wuki jɛ yi Nyɔ, Sataŋ se bɛ mfwaa mumkpaŋ buu jɛ yilu li shéŋ yibe.
Ŋgɔ yi tɛ̀ weyɛ fɛ kintsii ki ta-a yɛ nuuŋ bɛniiŋ bɛ wuki jɛ yi Nyɔ, be fi yi mfwaa mumkpaŋ bɛ kinɛɛtinɛ,
se nuuŋ le, yi tɛ̀ seri le yi gɛɛŋ li shéŋ yibee kɛ. Ɛ yi ŋɔɔnɛ niiŋ kwaa, ɛ ŋgɛ bɛ, kɛ ɛ bɛniiŋ biindi bikaa lɛ be jiŋ kii jɛ yilu, be chee bikaa lijiŋ mfwaa mumkpaŋ.
